name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹精密機電系統之基本架構包括機械系統(如機架、基礎、導程與軸承、動力傳遞系統等)及控制系統(如製程控制、數值控制、幾何資料處理、進給驅動器、位置量測系統、機器監視與診斷等)，探討先進精密機電系統(如工具機、機器人、FMS、CIM、微機電系統等)。
description.en: This course will give an introduction to basic components of the precision mechatronic system including mechanical systems (e.g. machine frame, machine foundation, bearings and guides, power transmission etc.) and control systems (e.g. process control, numerical control, geometric data processing, driving systems, position measurement system, automatic manufacturing monitoring and diagnostics, etc. ). Studies of advanced precision mechatronic systems including machine tools, robotics, FMS, CIM , micro- electro- mechanical systems (MEMS) and so on.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。學生與教授討論擬定專題研究的題目、在教授的個別指導下、 進行實驗研究、並將研究結果寫成報告。
description.en: The topic of the special project is discussed and together by the students and the advisor. Under the face-to-face instruction of the advisor the student will conduct the research and experiments, and the final report at the end of the semester.

description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: CAD套裝軟體介紹、CAD數值技巧、二維畫圖、三維畫圖、曲面模型、實體模型建立、動畫之製作、最佳化設計、整合性之CAD系統及專題。
description.en: Introduction of CAD software package. Review of Numerical technique for CAD.2-D Graphics, 3-D Graphics, surface modeling, solid modeling. Design optimization, Integrated CAD systems and Animation project.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。學生與教授討論擬定專題研究的題目、在教授的個別指導下、 進行實驗研究、並將研究結果寫成報告。

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。本課程讓學生熟悉機電系統之整合技術與設計(如機電介面之原理、機械系統、感測與致動之原理及其元件、自動控制技術等)。實務製作以分組方式實施，內容包括PC及DSP微處理器控制之倒單擺平衡系統、熱爐箱溫度控制、或自走機器人設計與控制等。
description.en: The course contains technology and design of mechatronic system. For example: interface principle, mechanical system design, sensor and actuator device, and automatic control, etc. Hands-on experiments are carried out by team work and may include PC-based and microprocessor-based control of inverted pendulum system, oven temperature control, or mobile robot design and control.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。學生與教授討論擬定專題研究的題目、在教授的個別指導下、 進行實驗研究、並將研究結果寫成報告。

For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 指導學生進行研究專題，以培育其實務的能力，學生必須選定一實務專題，由本系教師指導，在畢業前完成成品製作，且須有書面報告。
description.en: Teaching students to do the research work and to write the papers. Before graduation, the students have possessed the ability to do the R/D work. Each student must be through professor's instrution's instructions to select the topics of  special project, personal or group work should be completed the project's hardware or software and issued the paper. An announcement has been made by the department, then get the grade and credit.

description.zh: 配電系統規劃及自動化，負載特性，配電變壓器的應用，二次輸電線及配電站設計，一次系統的設計考慮，二次系統的設計考慮，電壓降落及電力損失計算，電容器在配電系統上的應用，配電系統電壓調整，配電系統負載潮流分析，配電系統故障分析。
description.en:
Course Title:Industrial power distribution Labs.
Description:To familiarize students with the techniques of analyzing,
designing, operating, maintaining high and low voltage power
distribution systems.

notes: 四電四甲乙合開,預選限80人

description.zh: 各種時域響應之電腦繪圖，矩陣各項特性分析與應用，根值軌跡圖，波德圖，奈奎士圖，PID控制器之設計，Lead-Lag補償器之設計，控制器時域及頻域分析，控制器在狀態空間之設計，實例探討，書報研讀。
description.en:
Course Title:Automatic Control Practice
Description:This course is first to introduce the basic concepts of
control systems and the mathematical background, second, state the
transfer function, block diagram and signal  flow graph, third,
discuss the mathematical modeling of control systems and elements, and
forth, describe the time-domain analysis, root locus techniques and
frequency-domain of control systems, and then to measure the character
of control systems, Finally, the design of control system will be
introduced.

description.zh: 本課程目標為提升學生英文之閱讀能力與聽力。包含增加英文單字數量，科技論文文法、句型、結構等特質，及訓練聽力習慣。
description.en: This course aims to leverage up the ability of English reading and listening for students. It includes vocabulary amount increasing, grammar recognition, sentence style and organization, and listening comprehension.

description.zh:
前言、DSP 架構、指令、定址法
乘法加法、量化誤差、假信號
FIR 濾波器、濾波器設計
description.en:
Introduction
DSP architecture
Instructions
Addressing mode
MAC instructions
Quantization error
Aliasing
FIR filters
Filter design

notes: 四電四甲乙丙合開,預選限40人

When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程以化工程序中所包含的製程如蒸餾、熱交換器、攪拌、泵、機械分離等，由質量、能量及動量均衡開始講述，然後探討程序設計時使用的流程圖及其符號、成本估算、管線配置、流體輸送、化工單元規格設計等。
description.en:
Application of chemical engineering science techniques to design of chemical processes. Comprehensive problems are assigned which include heat, material and economic balances, unit operations and processes, kinetics and thermodynamics.
The major responsibility is placed on individuals or small groups for the optimum design and selection of equipment, and for the calculations of required sizes, plant layout, and cost analyses.

description.zh: 藉理論基礎配合儀器設備，使學生知道微電腦之應用，並以電腦來控制流量、溫度、PH值等動態模擬。
description.en: By the use of flow rate control instrument, temperature control instrument, liquid level control instrument and pressure control instrument, students study the applicability of basic control theory.

description.zh: 利用基因工程，生物化學、微生物學之原理，培養變種之微生物（或改良過的微生物），動、植物細胞，以製造生物活性物質（如抗生素、免疫體、酵素、毒素、激素、特殊結構之蛋白、脂肪、醣類、脂肪酸、氨基酸、生長因子、藥理活性成份、抗體等等）
description.en: By the application of genetic engineering, biochemistry and microorganisms or animal or plant cells and how to produce living organisms.

description.zh: 介紹防止環境污染相關之防止技術。依氣體、液體、固體、噪音、輻射等各種不同污染源﹐分別探討解決空氣、水質、土壤、噪音以及熱污染之防治方法。內容包括環境工程有關之單元操作及設計﹐並對生物反應氣之組合、操作及用途加以介紹。
description.en: This course introduces the technology of environmemtal pollution prevention. It investigates the way to control air, water, soil, noise and thermal pollutions according to various gas, liquid, solid, noise and radioactive pollution sources. The content of this course involves the unit operation and design for environmental engineering concerned equipments. It also introduce the combination of bioreactors, operation and use of these reactors for the application to environmental engineering.

notes: 大四合開,初選人數限制50人

description.zh:
結合生物技術與化工原理來進行微生物、動、植物細胞之培養、酵
素之提取、反應動力學、生物反應器的操作與相關參考數之獲取法
、產品之分離程序等。
description.en: In combination of biotechnology and chemical engineering to learn cell incubation, enzyme purification, bioreactor operation, and product separation, etc.

notes: 大四合開,初選人數限制30人

name.zh: 單元操作與輸送現象(四)

description.zh: 本課程內容包括質傳應用、粉粒體操作單元。
description.en: This course contents mass transfer application and operations involving particulate solids.

description.zh: 讓學生學習文獻之蒐集方法與整理，以便瞭解學術論文製作方式，培養學生獨立自主探討一個理論或技術上的問題，並經由實驗設計及資料之判讀更深入專業領域。
description.en: A course allows students collect and oranize literature information and them design their own experiments. An independent research capability can be developed through out this learning process.

description.zh: 本課程將簡介醫學基礎與臨床知識，並對目前臨床使用之生醫材料作廣泛的介紹，與現今生物科技相結合，激發學生對於基礎研究及臨床科學的創意與思考。涵蓋科別將以牙科、骨科及整型外科為主。
description.en: This course will introduce basic medical and clinical knowledge. Those biomaterials that have been clinically applied will be focused. The aim is to inspire students' innovation and thinking about clinical science, through combining concepts of biotechnology with biomedical knowledge. Dentistry and orthopedics will be the major departments summarized.

notes: 大四化工所合開;90人教室

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程以化工程序中所包含的製程如蒸餾、熱交換器、攪拌、泵、機械分離等，由質量、能量及動量均衡開始講述，然後探討程序設計時使用的流程圖及其符號、成本估算、管線配置、流體輸送、化工單元規格設計等。
description.en:
Application of chemical engineering science techniques to design of chemical processes. Comprehensive problems are assigned which include heat, material and economic balances, unit operations and processes, kinetics and thermodynamics.
The major responsibility is placed on individuals or small groups for the optimum design and selection of equipment, and for the calculations of required sizes, plant layout, and cost analyses.

description.zh: 藉理論基礎配合儀器設備，使學生知道微電腦之應用，並以電腦來控制流量、溫度、PH值等動態模擬。
description.en: By the use of flow rate control instrument, temperature control instrument, liquid level control instrument and pressure control instrument, students study the applicability of basic control theory.

description.zh: 利用基因工程，生物化學、微生物學之原理，培養變種之微生物（或改良過的微生物），動、植物細胞，以製造生物活性物質（如抗生素、免疫體、酵素、毒素、激素、特殊結構之蛋白、脂肪、醣類、脂肪酸、氨基酸、生長因子、藥理活性成份、抗體等等）
description.en: By the application of genetic engineering, biochemistry and microorganisms or animal or plant cells and how to produce living organisms.

description.zh: 讓學生學習文獻之蒐集方法與整理，以便瞭解學術論文製作方式，培養學生獨立自主探討一個理論或技術上的問題，並經由實驗設計及資料之判讀更深入專業領域。

description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 使學生認識陶瓷製造的基本過程及測試陶瓷基本性質，包括陶瓷材料之物理，機械，及電導性質。除配合國內產業結構外，本實習課程將另介紹對新陶瓷的製程技術概念。
description.en: Let students understand the basic process of ceramics manufacturing and the fundamental property of testing ceramics, including the physical, mechanical and electricity conductivity property of ceramics material. Except for matching the domestic industry development structure, this laboratory course shall introduce the new manufacturing technique concept of new ceramics.

description.zh: 本課程內容目的在介紹電化學之原理與其應用.一、在原理方面包括離子之作用及其平衡,電解質之導電性質,界面現象,電極電位,電化學電池和電極動力程序等內容.二、在應用方面則涵蓋溶液化學參數測量,電化學分析技術,電鍍,表面處理,金屬腐蝕防治,電池應用,和電合成等
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry and its applications. In the principles which includes ionic interaction, ionic equilibrium, the conducting properties of electrolytes, interfacial phenomena, electrode potentials, electrochemical cells and electrode kinetic process. For the application covers determination of physical parameters in the solutions, electroanalytical techniques, electroplating, electrochemical sensors, surface finishing, metal corrosion prevention, cells, electrodialysis, and electrosynthesis etc.

description.zh:
訓練學生獨立思考，培養學生對材料性質之認識及製造能力，專題
內容包括材料性質認識，材料保固技術訓練，材料表面處理，技術
培育等。學生必須研讀相關文獻後再研討專題實驗內容，並對實驗
及結果加以詳述，而完成學士論文報告。
description.en:
This course is trying to train independent thinking, to cultivate understanding
and manufacturing ability of material property for students, the content of
this subject includes the knowledge of material characteristics, the technique
training of material protection, the surface treatment, technique cultivation,
etc.. All the students must study related documents before they research
the subject-matter content, they have to make a detailed report to the
experiment and result at the final report.

description.zh: 本課程介紹電子顯微鏡之結構，成像及繞射原理，以及在材料科學方面之應用，課程內容包括穿透式電子顯微鏡之構造，電磁透鏡與成像原理，電子繞射原理，繞射圖型分析，試片之製作方法。掃描式電子顯微鏡之構造及成像原理。EDS及WDS之X光光譜測量。
description.en:
The course introduces the structure of a electron microsope,the theories of forming 
image and diffraction, the applications of material science. The course contents include the transmission electron microscope structure,the electronic magnetic lens and image formation theory, electronic diffraction theory, diffraction diagram analysis, and the making of test sample, the structure and forming image principle of a scanning electron microscope, the X-ray spectrography of EDS and WDS.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

name.en: Special Topics on Mineral Resources Engineering (II)

description.zh: 訓練學生獨立思考，培養學生對礦物資源之認識及應用能力，專題內容包括資源開發及地質工程、資源應用及材料合成、以及資源處理及材料製程等三大專長領域。學生必須研讀相關文獻後再研討專題實驗內容，並對實驗及結果加以詳述，而完成學士論文報告。
description.en: This course is trying to train independent thinking, to cultivate understanding and apply ability of mineral resources, the content of this subject includes the mining and geology engineering, the use of resources and materials synthesis, the resources and materials handling process, etc.. All the students must study related documents before they research the subject-matter content, they have to make a detailed report to the experiment and result at the final report.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程之內容設計主要是使學生在指導教授的教導下能實際去研究有關土木工程上的應用,從中學生能學習到解決土木上任何問題的方法.
description.en: This course is dsesigned to let the student works on any practice research of civil engineering under the guidence of adviser .From the procedure,students can learn the solution method of any practice problem of civil engineering.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 學生與教授討論擬定之研究題目,在教授個別指導下,進行實驗之研究,以培養學生尋找相關資料,文獻及獨立研究的訓練,並將其研究成果撰寫成報告並公開發表練習。
description.en: To make students able to carry out independent study.  Students will be assigned a short topic.  An independent experimental design, data analysis, and final report presentation are necessary for this course.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在培養學生論文尋找及期刊選讀之能力，每位學生必須針對專一之問題尋找最近相關的資料。問題的認定，由老師協助資料之準備及口頭報告等是學生不可少的。且一學期至少須報告2次。學期成績將以學生在課堂上參與的態度及兩份書面資料決定。
description.en: This course is aimed at providing a training of review and paper studies for 4th grade students. Students are requested to search for the latest papers for a specific topic. Presentation and discussion are required for all attendants, twice persemester. The final score for a student will be determined based on students interaction in the class and two written reports.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹1.新型的高分子合成方法，2.各類高科技高分子材料之合成探討。
description.en: This is a special course to elucidate advanced polymer synthesis and the discussion of the high-tech polymer materials.

name.en: Practice on Fabric Coating and Finishing

description.zh: 了解及熟悉各種布膜塗佈之技術, 每周實習以製作各種功能性布料為主. 布膜塗佈之技術包含(1)刮刀塗佈，(2)輪式塗佈，及(3)熔融輪壓塗佈(順塗，逆塗)等。功能性布料種類則包含吸汗，透氣，撥水，保溫，抗起球等各種性質。
description.en: To introduce various coating techniques which include (1) knife coating (2) gravure coating (3) hot melt coating (co-rotating and counter rotation). The functions built in the fabric includes (1) water absorption (2) water repellence (3) cooling (4) warm protection (5) anti peeling… etc..

description.zh: 最近數年應用電腦軟體來計算分子的幾何形狀與力學數據已變得相當熱門，這些軟體不但計算小分子相當快速，即使是很複雜的分子也可行。本課程探討現行染料化學所常用軟體的應用範圍、準確性與限制條件並舉數個例子來顯現其優點。
description.en: Within the last few years, computer programs have been developed which are based on force-field methods, allowing for fast calculations of the molecular geometry and dynamics of single molecules as well as more complex systems. This course is designed to provide a survey of the commonly used theoretical methods in dye chemistry,to discuss their scope and limitations, and to present some examples as illustrations of their advantages.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh:
1.電腦網路概述
2.階層結構
3.路由與交換
4.流量與擁塞控制
5.媒體存取控制
6.區域網路協定與標準
７．網路互連

本課程在研習類比積體電路設計，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前類比CMOS積體電路分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。

description.en:
This course is concerned with the analog integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of analog CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 
1.Introduction o analog design
2.Basic MOS device physics
3.Single-stage amplifiers
4.Differential amplifiers
5.Frequency response
6.Noise
7.Feedback
8.Operational amplifiers
9.Oscillators
10.Phase-locked loops

Electronic Design Automation 13.Special projects.

name.zh: 智慧整合感控系統概論

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養設計與實作智慧整合感控系統(CPS)，其中包括：感測、無線通訊、嵌入式系統與雲端計算相關技術，將以上課及實作的方式讓同學們習得智慧整合感控系統的相關背景知識和設計能力，預計在這門課之中，學生們將能以做中學的方式，並透過實習方式在嵌入式平台上練習定位、體感與分散式計算等系統建置。
description.en: This course covers theoretical foundations and applications in cyber-physical system design. The outline of this course is given as follows. 1. Introduction, 2. Embedded Development Tools and Environment, 3.Wireless Sensor (Multi-hop) Communication, 4. Discrete System and Sensor Modeling, 5. Distributed Computation Modeling.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 介紹設施規劃，合理化的觀念、原理、方法步驟，舊規劃合理化的理由、重要性、方法及步驟。設施搬運系統及位置的遴選、及其考慮因素及決定方法
description.en: This course introduces the concepts, theories, and approaches of facilities planning.  Material handling and site selection are also included.

name.zh: 顧客關係管理與商業智慧
name.en: Customer Relationship Management and Business Intelligence

description.zh: 顧客關係管理主要目的是了解企業與顧客之關係，促使顧客滿意及忠誠回應而產生終身價值，進而提昇企業獲利，其內容包括顧客關係管理的概念與本質、顧客行為、顧客資料探勘、顧客關係管理系統、顧客關係管理專案之規劃與管理、顧客關係管理的績效衡量、顧客關係管理實務研討。商業智慧(Business Intelligence, BI)，是企業利用現代資訊技術收集、管理和分析結構化與非結構化的企業資料與資訊，創造和累積企業知識與見解，以改善企業決策品質與採取有效的企業行動，進而提升企業各方面績效。由基本現場管理(Shop Floor Control)需求談起，然後介紹製造資訊分類與收集技術（包括RFID），也將包括資料庫與資料倉儲觀念，最後介紹BI於顧客關係管理之應用。課堂中也將輔以目前市面上商用BI套裝軟體，並將其專業上相關資訊在此系統上實際應用，體驗BI對企業之重要性。
description.en: The objectives of Customer Relationship Management (CRM) are to study the relationship between corporation and customer, to increase the profit by customer lifetime value through customer satisfaction and royalty. The topics of this course includes concepts and context of CRM, consumer behavior, customer data mining, CRM system, planning and management of CRM projects, performance measurement of CRM. Business intelligence (BI) systems refer to applications and technologies which gather and analyze data about company operations. It then provides a comprehensive correlation of those factors, such as metrics on sales, production, internal operations, and helps managers to make better business decisions. This course focuses on applications of BI in CRM, with the introduction of shop floor control concepts and data collection techniques such as RFID, along with database and data warehouse concepts. Hands-on experience in BI software implementation is also emphasized.

description.zh: 指導學生進行研究專題，以培育其實務的能力，學生必須選定一實務專題，由本系教師指導，在期末完成成品製作，且須有書面報告。
description.en: Teaching students to do the research work and to write the papers. Before graduation, the students have possessed the ability to do the R/D work. Each student must be through professor's instrution's instructions to select the topics of special project, personal or group work should be completed the project's hardware or software and issued the paper. An announcement has been made by the department, then get the grade and credit.

description.zh: 本課程介紹資料分析與圖示的工具與方法，包括如何以精確的模式來描述資料、利用各種指標與圖形來探索給定資料的特性、特徵、或是規律性，並且可以根據所建立的資料模型來進行估計與預測。此外，我們也將探討如何產生各種機率分布的隨機樣本，以及各種最佳化問題求解。本課程將以R程式語言為工具。
description.en: This course introduces tools and methods for data analysis and graphics. The main topics include models that are used to describe data, indices and plots for exploring data characteristics and patterns, and estimation and prediction based on the data models. In addition, we discuss how to generate random sample from probability distributions and how to solve optimization problems. The selected tool for this course is R.

description.zh:
以工業設計的工作領域為範圍，藉由個案討論方式使學生熟練設計管
理中有關方針之形成、計劃、聯繫、監督、評價、形象策略與控制、
再教育、人事管理及合約等技術,設計的組織雖與決策，設計過程之管理，設計政策與產品策略之訂定，溝通技巧及設計之法律問題。
。
description.en: This courses contents identifies specific topic areas: Nature of Design Work and its management, Quality by Design, Design in a Business Context, Legal Aspects of Design, Design Policy Making.

description.zh: 以專題設計方式，訓練學生獨立企劃、分析、評斷、組織、歸納與創新之思考，並實際演練完整之設計過程。學生經由分組或獨自完成一設計主題。上學期課程以題目界定、資料收集、分析調查、結論定義、構想發展及草模提交等為教學內容，下學期則進行細部設計、模型製作、專刊編輯、展示佈置以及設計報告提交等為教學內容,以培養專業設計之能力。
description.en: Studio in product design for the senior. Students are expected to exhibit a full range of professional competence and facility in designing advanced products and component complexes of broad scope. All phases of each project design are brought to a professional level under supervision of the director. This course puts emphasis on presentation techniques, including verbal, visual, and written. A project report is required.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the summer break　or other periods of time, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than 320 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

description.zh: 待修正；本課程主要在講解一般都市計畫的主要內容，同時針對台灣現行都市計畫的有關組織體系、實務作業與現況問題作有系統的探討。授課主題涵蓋：1.台灣空間規劃的階層體系、2.都市計畫組織體系與功能、3.台灣都市計畫的發展沿革、4.都市規劃的程序、內容與方法、5.規劃資料的搜集、調查與分析、6.土地使用計畫、7.交通計畫、8.公共設施計畫、9.都市更新、10.都市計畫未來的發展趨勢、11.實際案例分析、研討。
1.建築法規體系概述、2.中央法規標準法、3.建築法架構解說、4.建築師法及營造業管理規則、5.省市建築管理規則、6.省市畸零地使用規則、7.面臨現有巷道申請建築原則、8.都市計劃法系簡介及鄉關法規介紹、9.建築技術規則及台北市土地使用分區管制規則、10. 研定(修)中之建築法規介紹。
description.en: 1.	Introduction to the Building Law and Regulation System2.	Building Code3.	Construction Code4.	Urban planning Code5.	Zoning Code6.	Analysis on New Directions of the Codes

description.zh:
本課程(Thesis Design)以研究式設計(Research Design)為核心，於設計中對空間、環境、構築進行反思，提出不同之空間想像與落實方案，並積極參與實質空間之運作過程，促進與實務領域之相互參考。 
本課程除了做為畢業生的空間技術專業的總體檢，也透過畢業設計中以自由意識主動發現空間機會的具體設計作為，以培養學生未來邁入職場的倫理觀與態度，包含邁向專業實踐應具備的毅力，對空間、環境與社會的關懷與理解力，以及探索空間契機與挖掘技術問題解決方案之能力。課程期盼學生畢業後具備創造美好而正義的空間的能力，朝向空間專業者與行動者。
課程之成果為具備建築或空間意義之設計作品，其格式不限某種既定框架。內容應包含時空脈絡分析、議題探討、設計策略、研究或方法論、特定媒材之設計成果。
description.en:
Taking Research Design as the core, the course, Thesis Design, revisits space, environment, and construction, for proposing different imagination for places and relative implementation, so as to help students participate in the operation of physical space, as well as enhance cross-reference between the field of practice and academic training. 
In addition to a final examination of spatial techniques in professional program, this course breeds ethics and passionate attitudes into students for further professional practice, through the specific form of thesis design in which freedom of conscious initiative is provoked to find opportunities for certain spaces. Those that should be equipped with students through this course are the perseverance towards professional practice, the ability to program the space, to understand the society and environment, as well as to explore spatial opportunity and strategies for problem solving. 
The outcome of this course is expected to be an instinct desig

notes: 依指導學生數決定鐘點數

description.zh: 實務專題課程為建築專題設計（畢業設計）的輔助課程，分二學期：第一學期為前置課程，主要訓練學生具備獨立思考和建立自主觀點的能力，依教師專長指導學生探討和發展設計議題、收集相關資料和進行案例分析、自訂設計方法與流程、並提出畢業設計的研究方向；第二學期旨在加強學生在建築實務工作各領域的能力，結合設計課程的操作，對特定之實務課題（例如：空間計畫、結構分析、細部設計與大樣圖模、施工圖、機電配置、材料實驗、構築實作、綠建築檢討、CFD模擬、施工管理、法規檢討、BIM模型、競圖報告書、設計方法論、參數演算、動畫製作、專業rendering等項目）進行深入探討並提出專題報告。
description.en: The course works together with Special Topics on Architectural Design (Thesis Design) in two semesters. The first semester is preparatory course which trains students to think independently and establish independent perspective. Teachers of different fields guide students to explore design issues, collect data, have case study, develop design methodology, and propose future direction for thesis design . The second semester aims to enhance students' abilities in practice, such as planning, structural analysis, detail drawing, shop drawing, electrical and mechanical system, materials experiments, tectonic construction, green building evaluation, CFD simulation, construction management, regulatory review, BIM modeling, competition reports, design methodology, parametric algorithms, animation, rendering and so on.

description.zh: 待修正；本課程主要在教導學生對都市空間的體驗與涵構的認知，並使學生具備都市設計之基本能力與相關知識，其主要授課內容如下：1.在範圍上--主要探討都市的涵構含實質元素、自然環境及人文向度。2.在理論上--主要探討都市構成的空間基礎理論如圖地、連接及場所理論。3.在方法上--從社區居民的經營、都市設計程序的討論以至多元設計程序法之應用。4.在實務上--以台北市及高雄新市鎮為例，研討相關案例並讀設計準則之意含。

notes: 建築四和職二建五合開

name.en: Operation and Management of Real Estate

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為提供學生瞭解不動產開發案相關之理論基礎及實務經驗。不動產經營所涉及的領域甚廣，因此課程內容安排著重實務討論及法令解說，藉由案例分享瞭解地方政府落實開發建設可能涉及的資源課題與對策，例如容積獎勵、稅賦減免、都市計畫變更及容積移轉等；另外開發案財務分析導論及比較，讓學生可以系統性的認識各種類型不動產開發案之收益、稅制、規劃限制及風險等，除了增加實務的認識，對於個人理財亦有幫助。課程內容包含1.基礎財務分析、2.不動產相關法令解說、3.不動產產品規劃及銷售實務、4.不動產開發流程及實務、5.產業創新案例分享、6.產業政策與方向及7.實際案例參訪等。
description.en: The course provides both theoretical and pragmatic knowledge in real estate management. Course contents emphasize on practical recitations and codes commentaries. Factors such as area-allowanced incentives, tax reductions, amendments in city planning, and transfer area allowance are addressed in each case study. In addition, financial benefits, tax regulations, design constraints, and risk assessment in development different types are presented in systematic manner thru the course. Course topics include: 1. Fundamental financial analyses. 2. Real estate regulations and codes. 3. Real estate planning and marketing. 4. Procedures in real estate development. 5. Innovations in practice. 6. Real estate policy. 7. Visitation in projects.

notes: 建築四和職二建五合開

description.zh: 主要針對各種機能空間之室內設計規劃整體操作流程，透過實列介紹，瞭解實際施工圖如何繪製並論及施工現場施做問題解析。並介紹各種風格式樣之潮流趨勢之建材選用與整合室內色彩、照明、家具及設備等。
description.en: The course focuses on the overall practice procedure of interior planning and design in terms of various spaces. It covers the construction drawing method and the analysis of practical problems with some appropriate cases. Scores of style trends in materials and how they can be consistent with color, lighting, and equipment would also be introduced.

notes: 建築四和職二建五合開

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh:
先修課程:負責教授同意
自動控制概論，汽車自動變速簡介，液動基本原理，液體接合扭力變換器，行星齒輪與超速控制，自動閥控系統與換檔裝置，液壓油與液壓油之冷卻，電動自動變速簡介，各式變速箱舉例。
description.en:
Introduction to Automatic Control, Introduction to Automobile
Transmission, Hydraulic Principle, Hydraulic Coupling, Planetary Gears, Automatic Transmission Valve System, Hydraulic Oil Cooling System, Introduction to Electrical Transmission System.

description.zh:
先修課程：負責教授同意。
包括液滲檢測法、磁粉檢測法、放射線、超音波檢測法、中子射線、全像攝影檢測法等、針對各種檢測方法之原理、可靠度、靈敏度等作探討。
description.en: Liquid-Penetrant Examination, Magnetic Particle Examination, Radiographic Examination, Ultrasonic Examination, and other less common techniques. Physical Bases of Tests, Materials to which applicable, Calibration Standards, Reliability.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本門課內容包括以下﹕能量與動力原理，燃料與燃燒簡介，鍋爐與熱交換器簡介，渦輪機與內燃機，核能與水力發電動力廠
description.en: This course is an introduction to the following topics﹔principles of energy and power, fuels and combustion, boiler and heat exchanger, turbine and internal combustion systems, nuclear and hydraulic power plants.

description.zh: 指導學生進行研究專題，以培育其研發能力。每一位學生必須經指導教授選定題目，獨立或數位同學成一組完成硬體或軟體專題，並書寫印製，經系公開展示與評分。
description.en: Teaching students to do the research work and to write the papers. Before graduation, the students have possessed the ability to do the R/D work. Each student must be through professor's instructions to select the topics of special project, personal or group work should be completed the project's hardware or software and issued the paper. An announcement has been made by the department, then get the grade and credit.

description.zh: 本課程實習內容主要包含冷凍空調節能技術；動態節能模擬分析；無塵室節能技術；潔淨能源(諸如太陽能、風能、燃料電池等)技術。
description.en: This practice course mainly contains: energy-saving technology in refrigeration and air conditioning, dynamic energy simulation, energy-saving technology in cleanrooms and clean energy (such as solar energy, wind energy, and fuel cell, etc).

description.zh: 本課程著重冷凍系統和空調系統能源的分析，探討構成系統的主要元件－壓縮機、蒸發器和冷凝器的耗能，和各泵、冰水盤管、空調箱及風／水管路系統的能源耗損，進而對整個系統運轉時的效率予以檢討。最後提出各種改善方法，節約能源和減少電力契約容量的技術，以使學生具有節能省電的正確理論觀念和實務技術。
description.en:
This lesson is focused on the energy analyses of refrigeration systems and air-conditioning systems. The operating defects of compressors, evaporators and
condensers are to be investigated. Also the energy consumption's of pumps, fan coils air-handling units and duct/water systems are studied. The over all performance of the entire system is thus discussed. Several methods to improve the shortages and the techniques to energy conservation and electricity demand cut-down will be proposed.
The students should understand correctly the theory of energy conservation and the
technology to improve the systems.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh:
本課程旨在發展學生獨立規劃及從事研究的能力，學生可在指導老師的指導下，依個別的需求選擇研究的方向，訂定題目，並獨立完成研究計畫，撰寫報告。
專題研究範圍含：
 實驗研究
 量調查研究或質調查研究
 個案研究
 回溯研究
 文化比較研究
 理論闡述研究
本課程著重分析中英文之句型, 語法, 慣用語等表達方式及比較其異同之處,並以密集練習及詳細解說交替, 使學生在兩種語言思考間運用自如。
description.en: This course focuses on the presentation of basic syntax, common expression, sentence structure, and an analytical comparison between the methodologies of English and Chinese translation, accompanied with frequent writing practice on students' part.

description.zh: 本課程旨在強化學生口語表達及溝通能力，開拓知識領域以及培養學生的國際觀。由逐步短句，段落至長途步口譯，循序漸進。從入門訣竅如讀稿技巧，筆記要領密集訓練及模擬演練。範圍涵蓋經貿，金融，時事，科技，產業等。
description.en: This course aims to strengthen students' oral expression and communicative abilities in English, broaden knowledge and international views. The course is designed to train the students gradually by using the techniques of Consecutive Interpretation, which starts from short sentences and paragraphs and leads to longer passages. For example, the techniques in sight translation, note-taking and various simulation drills are intensely practiced in class. It ranges from commercial & trade, banking affairs, current events, technologies and production.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解策略管理的意義及其演進, 如何建立公司策略以增加之競爭力。課程主要內容包括：1.策略管理的意義, 2.企業內外在環境分析, 3.策略制定, 4.策略執行與評估, 5.事業階層策略, 6.公司策略, 7.購併。
description.en: The objective of the course is to establish a set of frameworks for the formulation and implementation of strategy. Topics of the course include SWOT, strategy formulation, strategy implementation, business-level strategy, corporate-level strategy, and merger & acquisition.

description.zh: 由於休閒產業與生活息息相關，期予學生能充分瞭解休業，將來就業或是對未來休閒生活都會有很大幫助。課程內包括：1.休閒產業簡介、2.休閒的經營系統、3.休閒的型式與活動、4.休閒的顧客服務。
description.en: Because the recreation industry correlation about the life, hope students will understand recreation and have much helpfulness to purse an occupation or life of recreation. The course include:1.The introduction of recreation industry.2.The working system of recreation.3.The play and style of recreation.4.The customer service of recreation.

description.zh: 本課程包含：國際經濟環境，文化與政治差異，國際行銷組織，行銷組合決策，及國際行銷資訊系統。
description.en: This course focuses on three major areas: 1.The environment of global markets and cross-cultural comparison.2.Assessment of global market opportunities and threats.3.Development and implementation of global marketing strategies.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程由老師指導學生選定題目，進行該題目之問題定義、分析、設計與製作。專題完成後需撰寫書面報告並公開展示成品。專題範圍包含：1.多媒體系統 2.電腦網路 3.軟體分析與設計4.影像與音訊處理 5.微算機應用
description.en: In this course, the instructor will guide the students to fulfill a special project through the phases of problem formulation, analysis, design and implementation. The final work should be demonstrated in the public along with a written report. The topics include 1.Multimedia systems 2.Computer networks 3.Software analysis and design 4.Audio and video signal processing 5.Microprocessor-based applications

description.zh: 本課程目標旨在介紹學生軟體工程的概念，並瞭解相關的技術與應用。學生將會學習，開發一個高品質軟體所需要的軟體工程原理、觀念、方法、技術、與步驟。本課程將介紹下列主題：專案流程、專案管理與規劃、.系統需求分析、系統設計方法、系統測試與驗證、系統維護方法等。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with a better knowledge and skills in software engineering. In particular, students will learn about the principles, concepts, methods, and techniques of the software engineering approach to producing quality software. The course covers the subjects on software process models, project management and planning, software requirement specifications and analysis models, software design methods, software verification and validation techniques, and software maintenance.

description.zh: 本課程包含機率與隨機程序的基礎原理,如機率量測,隨機變數,大數法則,隨機程序,穩態隨機程序及其特性。本門課程為研究所在通訊及控制組之基本課程。
description.en: This course contains the basic theories in probability and random processes. It includes probability measures, random variables, the law of large numberrandom processes and stationary processes. The course is a basic course in field of communications and controls in graduate school.

notes: 資工四、資工所和電資國際班合開

description.zh: 本課程是研究所程度進階的巨量資料探勘與應用課程，主要介紹巨量資料探勘概念和原理、分散式計算基本架構、及各種應用包括: Link Analysis、Social Network Graph Mining、推薦系統等, 並且將介紹在處理巨量資料時常用的機器學習方法, 如: 類神經網路、SVM等，除了觀念的介紹外，透過平行化程式設計的練習以及期末專題，能讓學生認識實際巨量資料探勘的程式設計以及機器學習等工具的應用方式。
description.en: This course introduces the concepts in big data mining and advanced applications in machine learning. Topics include big data concepts, distributed computing infrastructure, and machine learning methods commonly used in processing big data, such as neural networks, support vector machines. In addition to concept introduction, parallel programming exercises and term projects are included to help students understand the processing steps and practical tools in big data anlaytics.

notes: 資工四、資工所、資財所和電資國際班合開

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 指導學生進行研究專題，以培養其實務的能力，學生必須選一實務專題，由本系教師指導，在畢業前完成成品製作，且需有書面報告。
description.en: This course is to train students to do the research work and to write the papers. Before graduation, students have the ability to do the R/D work. Each student or group must select one research topic or one project and make a proposal or an announcement by professors' instruction.

description.zh: 1.簡介 2.視覺與色彩 3.陰極射線管顯示器 4.電漿顯示器 5.液晶顯示器 6.電致發光顯示器 7.場發射顯示器 8.有機發光顯示器
description.en: 1.Introduction 2.Sight and color 3.Cathode-ray tube(CRT) 4.Plasma panel display(PDP) 5.Liquid crystal display(LCD) 6.Electrolumisence display(ELP) 7.Field emission display(FED) 8.Organic light emitting device(OLED)

notes: 系所合開,擬抵研究所不列大學畢業學分請選研究所課號

description.zh: 1. 太陽能電池工作原理，2. 半導體材料與模型，3. 理想轉換效率，4. 單晶矽太陽能電池，5. 薄膜太陽能電池，6. 太空與聚光太陽能電池，7. 有機與敏染太陽能電池。
description.en: 1 Principles of Solar Cells Operation, 2. Semiconductor Material and Modeling, 3. Ideal Conversion Efficiency, 4. Crystalline Silicon Solar Cels, 5. Thin Film Solar Cell Technology, 6. Space and Concentrator Cells, 7. Organic and Dye Sensitised Cells.

notes: 系所合開,擬抵研究所不列大學畢業學分請選研究所課號

description.zh: 先修課程：電磁學、工程數學、近代物理。 由電磁學之理論推導光波在光導波管之運行、偶合及調變，並經由近代物理之量子論介紹雷射理論及光偵測器原理。經由雷射之電光調變、光導波管之電場調制與光偵測器之光電轉換，將積體光學之基本概念完整介紹，並針對其特性及應用，加以說明。
description.en: From the electromagnetic theory, the optical waves propagation, coupling, and modulating in optical wave-guides are proposed. Also from the quantum theory introduced by modern physics, the laser theory and the principles of photo detectors are introduced. By the concepts of electro-optical modulation of laser devices, electrical modulation of optical wave-guides, and the opto-electronic conversion of photo detector devices, the fundamental concepts of integrated optics are introduced. Also the characteristics and applications of integrated optics are presented.

notes: 系所合開,擬抵研究所不列大學畢業學分請選研究所課號

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: N
description.en: N

description.zh: 培養學生認識與深入研究更多不同文化。
description.en: This course is designed to cultivate students’ understanding and deep research on more different cultures.

description.zh: 大稻埕文創社區經營結合歷史、建築、文化、音樂、茶道、祭典與近代社會運動、歷史遺跡，組合成豐富的大稻埕文化，藉由對此社區活動的認識，結合現代文創元素，讓學子對台北的古遺跡有更深刻的認識，並打造「大稻埕」成為歷史街區活化的國際品牌，期盼在提升台灣學子的「就業即戰力」與「國際移動力」的同時，也成為當今我國文化外交戰略的重要環節。
description.en: The community management of Dadaocheng creative zone combines her own history, architecture, culture, music, tea ceremony, ceremonies and modern social movements, historical relics into a rich specific Dadaocheng culture, through propagating her community activities combined with modern creative elements.  We expect our students to improve their " employment agility" and "international mobility", by enabling them to have a deeper understanding of specific Dadaocheng culture. And then, Dadaocheng being an international brand is an important part of Taiwanese cultural diplomacy strategy.

notes: 共同科館614教室上課; 大四、碩班合開; 大四限20人

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Special Projects on Information and Financial Management

description.zh: 指導學生進行資訊與財金專題研究，以培育其研發能力。每一位學生必須經指導教授選定題目，獨立或數位同學成一組完成資訊與財金相關專題，並書寫印製，經系公開展示與評分。
description.en: Teaching students to do the research work on Information and Financial Management and to write the papers. Before graduation, the students have possessed the ability to do the R/D work. Each student must be through professor's instrution's instructions to select the topics of special project, personal or group work should be completed the project's hardware or software and issued the paper. An announcement has been made by the department, then get the grade and credit.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 藝術與新意的遇合，一切就從分享開始! 不論黑白彩色、平面立體、抽象具象、靜態動感，藝術一向變化多端，不論抒發情感、宣揚宗教、服務政治或是傳達思想，藝術從來不缺理由，別說你不懂藝術!因為在二十一世紀裡，藝術已不僅是貴婦們的權力，身為未來設計師與建築師的您們，應該積極讓藝術存在於你生活的週遭，不論分享美感經驗、探討觀點流派、解析藝術風格、從事文化創意設計，亦或是批判現今藝術社群，你都擁有發聲的權力。而此系列講座中的十場演講，都是在不同藝術領域中，從事創作多年的佼佼者，透過大師講座的平台，讓大師們進入校園，與全校師生一同分享這藝術與新意的無限饗宴。
description.en: When art meets innovation, everything starts from sharing! No matter art is black or white, flat or three-dimensional, abstract or concrete, motionless or active, it has always been protean. When art is used to express feelings, advocate religions, propagandizing politics, or transmitting thoughts, it never needs any reason. Don't say that you don't know what art is! In the 21st century, art is no longer the privilege of wealthy ladies. But you all, the future designers and architects, should work harder to make yourself inseparable with art. When you are sharing your own experience about esthetics, exploring different art sects, analyzing art styles, engaging in cultural creative design, or criticizing the contemporary art sects, you have the right to speak up. The ten speeches in this series will be delivered by many experts from different fields. It would be our honor to have them in the campus and share their fruition of art with all of the staff and students.

description.zh: 本課程旨在以專題設計方式，訓練學生確認並建立需求、發展設計選擇方案、製作設計的互動形式、設計評估的專業知能，並以設計專案方式演練完整之設計過程。學生經由分組合作或獨自創作完成一媒體設計主題。上學期課程以題目釐定、資料蒐集、分析調查、設計定義、構想發展、程式設計、雛型製作等活動為教學內容；下學期則進行觀察測試、使用性評估、程式調校、專刊編輯、展示佈置以及設計報告提交等為教學內容，以培養學生具備互動設計專題製作之專業知能。
description.en: Through project design, the course prepares students to confirm the needs of design, develop alternatives of media design projects, create interactive modes, and evaluate design performance through independent study or cooperative learning. In the first semester, learning materials of the course include subject clarification, data collection, analysis and investigation, design definition, concept development, programming, and prototyping. In the second semester, learning materials of the course include observation and testing, usability evaluation, programming debug, report editing, exhibition and design report submission. Accordingly, students will be ready for professional competencies of interaction design projects.

notes: 排一般教室,媒體設計組必修(限本系生修課)

description.zh: 本課程旨在以專題設計方式，訓練學生確認並建立需求、發展設計選擇方案、製作設計的互動形式、設計評估的專業知能，並以設計專案方式演練完整之設計過程。學生經由分組合作或獨自創作完成一視覺傳達設計主題。上學期課程以題目釐定、資料蒐集、分析調查、設計定義、構想發展、程式設計、雛型製作等活動為教學內容；下學期則進行觀察測試、使用性評估、程式調校、專刊編輯、展示佈置以及設計報告提交等為教學內容，以培養學生具備互動設計專題製作之專業知能。
description.en: Through project design, the course prepares students to confirm the needs of design, develop alternatives of visual communication design projects, create interactive modes, and evaluate design performance through independent study or cooperative learning. In the first semester, learning materials of the course include subject clarification, data collection, analysis and investigation, design definition, concept development, programming, and prototyping. In the second semester, learning materials of the course include observation and testing, usability evaluation, programming debug, report editing, exhibition and design report submission. Accordingly, students will be ready for professional competencies of interaction design projects.

notes: 排一般教室,視覺傳達設計組必修(限本系生修課)

description.zh: 本課程重點在培養學生設計並製作個人作品集的能力，作品媒材及形式包含平面、立體、裝置、錄像的製作及集體討論，並配合藝術教學，探討「藝術家∕作品∕觀眾」或「作者∕文本∕讀者」 之間的關係。修習本課程的學生必須完成一本收錄個人歷年作品之作品集。
description.en: This course is intended to help students develop their portfolio design; media of the portfolio includes 2D, 3D, installation, and video. To achieve this goal, students in this course are required to submit portfolio. In addition, they will discuss the relation between artist/ art/ audience or author/ text/ reader.

notes: 排一般教室,修課人數上限30人

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002012或負責教授同意。介紹各種不同分析方法（如能量法及Castigliano定理）、破壞理論、材料選用、可靠度概念、軸及軸承、離合器及煞車器、傳動元件(如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪)、軸聯接器、飛輪、彈簧等。
description.en:
Prerequisite: ME212 or Consent of Instructor Introduction to Analysis Methods (Energy method & Castigliano theorem), 
Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains, Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, and Springs.

description.zh: (A)熱工實驗：能量轉換、熱之傳遞、對流及輻射、熱交換器、燃燒及燃料等之實驗。(B) 流力實驗：雷諾數實驗、管路摩擦實驗(損失係數)、管路能量損失實驗(90°彎管、小半徑彎管、大半徑彎管、突擴、突縮)、文氏管流量實驗、孔口板流量實驗、壓力量測實驗、堰流量實驗、pump性能曲線實驗、壓力中心實驗、風洞實驗(升力、阻力係數)。
description.en:
(A) Thermal Lab.

Thermal experiments include energy transformation, heat conduction, convection, and radiation, heat exchanger, combustion, etc. 

(B) Fluid Mechanics Lab.

Reynolds’s Number test, Pipe friction test (loss coefficient), Pipe energy loss test (90°miter, elbow, sudden enlargement and contraction), Venturi meter flow measurement, Orifice flow measurement, Pressure measurement, Wear flow measurement, Pump performance test, Pressure center test, Wind tunnel experiments (lift and drag coefficient).

notes: 綜科428固力熱工，綜科429流力

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。自動控制數學基礎、物理系統的數學模式、控制器的種類、時域分析、穩定性分析、根軌跡法、頻率領域的分析、控制系統的設計、Z 轉換、數位控制、電腦控制之介面及程式、現代控制理論與簡介。實習項目：MATLAB介紹與應用、暫態響應、PID 控制的影響、Lead-Lag控制的影響、頻率響應、系統判別、控制器設計。
description.en:
Mathematical Foundation of Automatic Control, Mathematical Model of Physical System, Controller Type, Time-Domain Analysis, Stability Analysis, Root Locus Method, Frequency-Domain Analysis, Design of Control System, Z-Transform, Digital Control, Interface and Programming
of Computer Control, Theory and Introduction of Modern Control. Lab:Introduction and Application of MATLAB, Transient Response, Effect of PID Control, Effect of Lead-Lag Control, Frequency Response, System Identification, and Controller Design.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹產品製造的程序和各種加工方法，及使用的機械設備、製造過程材料及製程參數的影響，製程規劃及製造成本的因素、產品檢驗量測技術及品質管制的方法、製程自動化及電腦整合製造系統等。
description.en: Introduction to a variety of manufacturing processes and associated production equipments, operations planning and cost estimating of the production process, techniques of measurements and basic components of a quality control  system, concepts of process automation and computer integrated manufacturing.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002013或負責教授同意。簡易連桿組之合成（圖解法與解析法）、耦曲線在設計上之應用、同耦曲線族、機構之靜力與動力分析、轉子之平衡、機構之平衡、飛輪設計、引擎動力學與平衡、凸輪動力學、臨界轉速、球面與空間連桿組之簡介。
description.en: Synthesis of Four-bar linkage (Graphical and Analytical Method) , Application of Coupler careers in Design , coupler cognate Mechanisms static and dynamic analysis of Mechanisms. Balancing Rotating Masses, Flywheels, Balancing Reciprocating Masses, dynamics of Cams, critical Whirling speeds, Introduction of spherical and spatial linkages.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002012或負責教授同意。介紹各種不同分析方法（如能量法及Castigliano定理）、破壞理論、材料選用、可靠度概念、軸及軸承、離合器及煞車器、傳動元件(如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪)、軸聯接器、飛輪、彈簧等。
description.en:
Prerequisite: ME212 or Consent of Instructor Introduction to Analysis Methods (Energy method & Castigliano theorem), 
Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains, Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, and Springs.

description.zh: (A)熱工實驗：能量轉換、熱之傳遞、對流及輻射、熱交換器、燃燒及燃料等之實驗。(B) 流力實驗：雷諾數實驗、管路摩擦實驗(損失係數)、管路能量損失實驗(90°彎管、小半徑彎管、大半徑彎管、突擴、突縮)、文氏管流量實驗、孔口板流量實驗、壓力量測實驗、堰流量實驗、pump性能曲線實驗、壓力中心實驗、風洞實驗(升力、阻力係數)。
description.en:
(A) Thermal Lab.

Thermal experiments include energy transformation, heat conduction, convection, and radiation, heat exchanger, combustion, etc. 

(B) Fluid Mechanics Lab.

Reynolds’s Number test, Pipe friction test (loss coefficient), Pipe energy loss test (90°miter, elbow, sudden enlargement and contraction), Venturi meter flow measurement, Orifice flow measurement, Pressure measurement, Wear flow measurement, Pump performance test, Pressure center test, Wind tunnel experiments (lift and drag coefficient).

notes: 綜科428固力熱工，綜科429流力

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。自動控制數學基礎、物理系統的數學模式、控制器的種類、時域分析、穩定性分析、根軌跡法、頻率領域的分析、控制系統的設計、Z 轉換、數位控制、電腦控制之介面及程式、現代控制理論與簡介。實習項目：MATLAB介紹與應用、暫態響應、PID 控制的影響、Lead-Lag控制的影響、頻率響應、系統判別、控制器設計。
description.en:
Mathematical Foundation of Automatic Control, Mathematical Model of Physical System, Controller Type, Time-Domain Analysis, Stability Analysis, Root Locus Method, Frequency-Domain Analysis, Design of Control System, Z-Transform, Digital Control, Interface and Programming
of Computer Control, Theory and Introduction of Modern Control. Lab:Introduction and Application of MATLAB, Transient Response, Effect of PID Control, Effect of Lead-Lag Control, Frequency Response, System Identification, and Controller Design.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹產品製造的程序和各種加工方法，及使用的機械設備、製造過程材料及製程參數的影響，製程規劃及製造成本的因素、產品檢驗量測技術及品質管制的方法、製程自動化及電腦整合製造系統等。
description.en: Introduction to a variety of manufacturing processes and associated production equipments, operations planning and cost estimating of the production process, techniques of measurements and basic components of a quality control  system, concepts of process automation and computer integrated manufacturing.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002013或負責教授同意。簡易連桿組之合成（圖解法與解析法）、耦曲線在設計上之應用、同耦曲線族、機構之靜力與動力分析、轉子之平衡、機構之平衡、飛輪設計、引擎動力學與平衡、凸輪動力學、臨界轉速、球面與空間連桿組之簡介。
description.en: Synthesis of Four-bar linkage (Graphical and Analytical Method) , Application of Coupler careers in Design , coupler cognate Mechanisms static and dynamic analysis of Mechanisms. Balancing Rotating Masses, Flywheels, Balancing Reciprocating Masses, dynamics of Cams, critical Whirling speeds, Introduction of spherical and spatial linkages.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。

description.zh: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解信號與系統之基本概念及分析方法，以作為控制，通訊，電子電路，濾波器設計及數位信號處理等課程修習之基礎。課程內容包含：(1)標準訊號及訊號表示法 (2)連續系統的數學分析 (3)離散系統的數學分析 (4)拉氏轉換分析 (5)Z-轉換分析 (6)傅立葉分析 (7)工程應用。
description.en:
course title : signals and systems
description : this course contains the properties of signals , systems , LTI systems , and basis linear transforms . this is a basic course in the field of control and communication .

Course Title:Microprocessor
Description:This course introduces the working principles of computer.
It puts emphasis on both hardware and software, as well as both theory
and appplication. Basically, this course covers the introduction of
general microprocessors:their architecture and operation, Assembly
language program and module program, instruction addressing mode,
instruction operation, and I/O Program and interface. More
specifically, multi-programming configuration and multi-processing
configuration are also discussed here. New topics will be added if
needed.

description.zh: 通論，基本理論，傳輸線參數，傳輸線的數學模式，變壓器的數學模式及標么值系統，對稱成分，對稱三相故障，非對稱故障，負載潮流分析與控制，電力系統之經濟運轉，發電機之數學模式，電力系統穩定度，電壓控制系統，電力控制系統，系統保護。
description.en: Introduction, Basic principles, Transmission line parameters, Line model, power flow analysis, optimal dispatch of generation

description.zh: 探討各種電機特性及工作原理，內容包含：(1)磁路分析(2)電機-機械能量轉換 (3)繞組及氣隙磁動勢 (4)繞組電感及電壓方程式 (5)繞組因數 (6)直流機 (7)感應機 (8)同步機。
description.en:
Course Title:Electric Machinery
Description:Principles, Construction and Application of transformer,
DC motors, DC generators, induction motors, induction generators,
synchronous motors and synchronous generators.

notes: 四電三甲丙合開,預選限80人

description.zh: 最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之VLSI設計，使用MSI與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI之設計與測試技巧，各種CALD軟體工具介紹。
description.en:
1.Algorithms for Optimization of combirational logic
2.VLSI realizations of combination logic
3.Multilevel logic using complex parts and cells.
4.Components of sequential systems
5.Synthesis of clock-mode sequential circuits.

description.zh: (1)作業系統簡介 (2)工作觀念之介紹：異步及平行程式處理(3)記憶體管理：實際及虛擬記憶體之管理 (4)處理機管理：工作排序及多元處理 (5)輔助儲存體之管理：磁碟排序，檔案及資料庫 (6)網路作業系統及安全性(含分散式資料處理)(7)範例研究：DOS，UNIX Windows NT。
description.en:
1.History and evolution 

2.Process concepts

3.ASynchronous concurrent processes

4.Desdlock and indefinite postponrmrnt

5.Real storage management

6.Virtual storage organization and management 

7.Processor scheduling 

8.Disk mansgement

9.Network and security

notes: 四電三甲乙丙合開,預選限60人

description.zh: 半導體開關在電力電子電路之作用，波形失真與諧波分析,DC-DC轉換器，AC-DC轉換器，DC-AC轉換器。
description.en:
1.power semiconductor switches. 2.waveform distortion
  & harmonic analysis. 3.DC-DC converter. 4.AC-DC converter. 5.DC-AC converter.

description.zh: 簡介，二極體電路，雙極性電晶體電路，低頻小信號放大器，場效電晶體電路，功率放大器，回授放大器，差動放大器，多級放大器，運算放大器，頻率響應分析與設計，振盪器及濾波器分析與設計，固態半導體理論。
description.en:
Course Title:Linear Electronics
Description:This course is to study the characteristics of the
semiconductor devices and design of the electronic circuits.

notes: 四電三甲乙丙合開,預選限80人

description.zh: (1)向量分析 (2)靜電場理論：庫倫，高斯定律，電位能，電場能量與功，介電質電場現象，電容 (3)拉普拉斯方程式，電像法、邊界值問題 (4)靜磁場理論：畢沙瓦特，安培定律，磁位能，磁場能量與功，強磁性材料特性電感 (5)電磁感應與馬克斯威爾方程式。
description.en:
Course Title:Electromagnetism
Description:This is an introductory course of electromagnetic bias on
its Engineering applications. The course is divided into five parts
(1) the static electric field, (2) the steady electric current, (3)
the static magnetic field, (4) the quari-stationary electromagnetic
field and, (5) Maxwell equations and their applications.
Besides, the course also introduces some of the optical technology.

notes: 四電三甲乙合開,預選限80人

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in. name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解信號與系統之基本概念及分析方法，以作為控制，通訊，電子電路，濾波器設計及數位信號處理等課程修習之基礎。課程內容包含：(1)標準訊號及訊號表示法 (2)連續系統的數學分析 (3)離散系統的數學分析 (4)拉氏轉換分析 (5)Z-轉換分析 (6)傅立葉分析 (7)工程應用。
description.en:
course title : signals and systems
description : this course contains the properties of signals , systems , LTI systems , and basis linear transforms . this is a basic course in the field of control and communication .

notes: 電資二和電機三乙合開

description.en:
Course Title:Microprocessor
Description:This course introduces the working principles of computer.
It puts emphasis on both hardware and software, as well as both theory
and appplication. Basically, this course covers the introduction of
general microprocessors:their architecture and operation, Assembly
language program and module program, instruction addressing mode,
instruction operation, and I/O Program and interface. More
specifically, multi-programming configuration and multi-processing
configuration are also discussed here. New topics will be added if
needed.

description.zh: 通論，基本理論，傳輸線參數，傳輸線的數學模式，變壓器的數學模式及標么值系統，對稱成分，對稱三相故障，非對稱故障，負載潮流分析與控制，電力系統之經濟運轉，發電機之數學模式，電力系統穩定度，電壓控制系統，電力控制系統，系統保護。
description.en: Introduction, Basic principles, Transmission line parameters, Line model, power flow analysis, optimal dispatch of generation

description.zh: 探討各種電機特性及工作原理，內容包含：(1)磁路分析(2)電機-機械能量轉換 (3)繞組及氣隙磁動勢 (4)繞組電感及電壓方程式 (5)繞組因數 (6)直流機 (7)感應機 (8)同步機。
description.en:
Course Title:Electric Machinery
Description:Principles, Construction and Application of transformer,
DC motors, DC generators, induction motors, induction generators,
synchronous motors and synchronous generators.

description.zh: 最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之VLSI設計，使用MSI與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI之設計與測試技巧，各種CALD軟體工具介紹。
description.en:
1.Algorithms for Optimization of combirational logic
2.VLSI realizations of combination logic
3.Multilevel logic using complex parts and cells.
4.Components of sequential systems
5.Synthesis of clock-mode sequential circuits.

description.zh: 半導體開關在電力電子電路之作用，波形失真與諧波分析,DC-DC轉換器，AC-DC轉換器，DC-AC轉換器。
description.en:
1.power semiconductor switches. 2.waveform distortion
  & harmonic analysis. 3.DC-DC converter. 4.AC-DC converter. 5.DC-AC converter.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.en:
1.power semiconductor switches. 2.waveform distortion
  & harmonic analysis. 3.DC-DC converter. 4.AC-DC converter. 5.DC-AC converter.

description.zh: (1)向量分析 (2)靜電場理論：庫倫，高斯定律，電位能，電場能量與功，介電質電場現象，電容 (3)拉普拉斯方程式，電像法、邊界值問題 (4)靜磁場理論：畢沙瓦特，安培定律，磁位能，磁場能量與功，強磁性材料特性電感 (5)電磁感應與馬克斯威爾方程式。
description.en:
Course Title:Electromagnetism
Description:This is an introductory course of electromagnetic bias on
its Engineering applications. The course is divided into five parts
(1) the static electric field, (2) the steady electric current, (3)
the static magnetic field, (4) the quari-stationary electromagnetic
field and, (5) Maxwell equations and their applications.
Besides, the course also introduces some of the optical technology.

This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 本課程介紹利用質量、能量守恆定律(熱力學第一定律)及均衡方程式(熱力學第二定律)，並在導入逸壓（Fugacity）觀念下，討論單成份系相平衡問題。最後延伸至多成份系統的熱力學性質的探討。此外還介紹化工程序中真實流體流動熱力學、機械能均衡、熱力學機械之設計與作功原理、熱機循環之熱力函數及熱機效率。
description.en: This course is designed as an introductory course in thermodynamics of chemical engineering.  Topics include the first and second law of thermodynamics, open and closed system, thermodynamics properties of materials, generalied correlations with real fluids and multicomponent systems.  Emphasis is placed on the chemical potential and its use in phase equilibria and chemical reaction equilibria.

notes: 初選人數限制50人;50人教室

description.zh: 本課程之內容包括:化學動力學及反應機構之基本理論,動力學數據之處理,各式理想反應器之設計,非理想狀態反應器之討論,單獨觸媒中非均勻相反應器之討論.
description.en: The subjects of the course include 1) fundamental theories of chemical kinetics and reaction mechanisms, 2) kinetic data collection and manipulation, 3) design equations for ideal reactors, 4) discussions on nonideal reactors, and 5) nonhomogeneous catalytic reactions.

name.zh: 單元操作與輸送現象(二)

description.zh: 本課程內容包括熱量傳送操作及其應用。
description.en: This course contents heat transfer and its application.

description.zh: 本課程屬於生物技術的基礎課程，授課內容強調基本生化原理，介紹細胞組成份〈包括核酸、蛋白質、醣類和脂質〉的化學、生物活性及代謝，並分別闡明代謝作用與基因表現的調節機轉，輔以現今生化尖端學術研究的介紹，希望能以一學期的緊密課程，讓學生瞭解現代生化科技領域的輪廓，作為日後深造或從事生化科技行業的奠基。
description.en: A one-term introductory biochemistry course that covers the biochemistry of the living state; the chemistry of amino acids, proteins, nucleic acids, carbohydrates, lipids, and steroids; energy transformations and chemical reactions in living cells; action of hormones; and self-regulation and self-replication of living organisms.

description.zh:
應用單元操作的原理與知識，使學生從實際操作中瞭解各種單元操 
作設備的操作及性能。
description.en: The course provides facilities for students to apply theoretical and fundamental knowledge of unit operations. In such an environment, much emphasis is placed upon the operation and performance of various experimental units.

description.zh: 介紹各種精密化學分析儀器之原理及應用﹐學習組成結構之 鑑定、物種之分離及分析之工作方法。
description.en: Instruments are the tools for gathering qualitative and quantitative information about the composition and structure of matter, students must develop an understanding of these tools and how they are used to solve analytical problems.

notes: 大三合開;初選人數限制40人

description.zh: 以科學方法探討聚合物特性，使學生了解分子結構與物性的關係、物性之測定方法及物性與加工應用上之關係。
description.en:
The unique features of polymers are introduced.  Special
emphasis is given to the structuring effects of processing
on polymer morphology and properties.

name.zh: 藥用及化妝用高分子材料

description.zh: 本課程在教授學生藥用及化妝用高分子材料之相關產業製程及配方技術的實務知識，課程設計將首先介紹高分子材料的基本合成方法、物理化學性能、界面活性劑、乳化膠體及生物分解安全性。並教授高分子材料之應用區分為兩大類：其一是指在製藥之劑型加工時所用的和為改善藥物傳輸性能而採用的輔助材料(Excipients)，例如稀釋劑、潤滑劑、黏合劑、崩解劑、助流劑、緩和劑、穩定劑、保濕劑、膜包衣及膠囊殼等。藥用及化妝用輔助材料本身並不具有藥理作用，只是在藥品及化妝品的製造和使用中起從屬或輔助的作用。另一類高分子藥物則不同於前一類，它依靠連接在聚合物分子鏈上的藥理活性基團或高分子本身的藥理作用，進入人體後，能與機體組織發生生理反應，從而產生醫療美容或預防性效果。
description.en: The course is to provide the core knowledge for the development of pharmaceutical and cosmetic technology. It aims to educate and train students with the fundamental principles and applications of biodegradable polymers, surfactants, colloids, emulsions and their related physico-chemical properties. Then potential prospects of pharmaceutical and cosmetic polymers will be taught in two parts to help students understand the future frontiers in polymer science and technology. The first part of lectures will cover the wide range of polymer excipients such as diluents, lubricants, binders, disintegrants, glidants, demulcents, stabilizers, humercants, coatings, and capsules etc, which are inactive pharmaceutical ingredients used for assisting drug delivery. The second part will focus on polymer drugs, which are active pharmaceutical ingredients conjugated to polymer matrices such as polymeric micelles, liposomes, colloidosomes, and solid phase nanoparticle
