description.zh: n
description.en: n

description.zh: 本課程始自ㄧ系列關於「古代哲學」的演講，特別著重於自然主義哲學家的思想，如泰利斯、巴門尼德斯、赫拉克利圖斯，與德摩克利圖斯。藉此讓我們得以瞭解下述議題: 宇宙的基本物質、變化問題，與原子論。接下來，我們會探討希臘哲學，著重於:辯士學派、蘇格拉底、柏拉圖，與亞里斯多德。我們接著探討希臘化時期的學說: 如犬儒主義、斯多葛主義、伊比鳩魯學派、新柏拉圖主義，與神祕主義。最後我們轉向中世紀哲學，再接著探討文藝復興與巴洛克時期的思想。
description.en: The course starts with a series of lectures on ancient philosophy with an emphasis of thoughts presented by the Naturalistic philosophers who initiate our research interest in the Nature and our surroundings such as Thales, Parmenides, Heraclitus, and Democritus.  By doing so we would learn the following important topics such as the basic matter of the universe, the problem of change, and atomism.  We then shall move onto Greek philosophy with a particular look at the following philosophers: the Sophists, Socratics, Plato, and Aristotles.  Afterwards, we will study the theories and accounts during the Hellenistic period such as Cynicism, Stoicism, Epicureanism, Neo-Platonism, and Mysticism. We then will turn to Medieval philosophy, followed by a close look at thoughts appeared in the Renaissance and Baroque era.

description.zh: 本課程旨在訓練學生的的口語溝通技巧，同時培養精準的表達能力，透過故事轉化、技巧傳授、對話練習、簡報技巧的實務練習，培養學生具有準確、沉穩具思考力及說服力的溝通與表達能力。
description.en: This course aims to introduce different skills related to oral communication strategy, which includes personal communication, power point and oral presentation, stories narration, critical thinking strategies, and the communication ways of TED.

description.zh: n
description.en: n

description.zh: 文化創意產業含蓋甚廣，不僅僅包含了人文、藝術，甚至在族群文化振興、媒體研究、博物館經營與藝術管理、大眾消費、設計等領域都被重視。也因為文化創意是一塊值得投資的領域，更誘引這些族群的工作者紛紛投入與文化創意產業結合的工作。而本課程將全程使用英文來授課，也可藉由閱讀國內外文化創意相關文章，培養學生的英文閱讀、聽、說、與寫作能力，進而培養更多元的國際觀。
description.en: Covering a wide cultural and creative industry, the cultural vocation development not only includes the humanities, arts, and even has been valued at ethnic culture promotion; media studies, museum management and arts management, marketing, design, and other related these fields. Because of the cultural and creative field is a worthwhile investment; this reason inspires workers that have invested in these communities, cultural, and creative industries combined work. And through this course will be taught in English, but also by learning the foreign cultural related the cultural articles, students can practice English reading, listening, speaking, and writing skills, and to cultivate more diversified international views.

description.zh: n
description.en: n

description.zh: 本課程將就臺灣目前的史蹟，依其性質分類使修課學生更進一步瞭解這些史蹟，並透過專家演講及實地參與史蹟導覽活動，學習如何將所學到的史蹟知識介紹給一般旅遊者或有興趣的大眾。
description.en: This course aims to introduce different types of historical sites in Taiwan, and application related to the studies of cultural tourism. Lecturers, speeches and field trips are included in this course to help student to learn the ways to introduce cultural spots to visitors, includes tour planning, stories interpretation and oral presentation.

description.zh:
1.了解立體造型的意義、內容與構成原理。
2.歸納與演繹多元媒材表現的原理原則。
3.透過對材料技法之應用，提升創意發想的能力。
4.運用多重媒介刺激理解造型的可能性與特質。
5.引導同學以實際製作，傳遞創意。
description.en:
1.Three-dimensional perception: exercises and develop students perception of volume and space. 

2.Visual language: development of a personal visual language through creative projects. 

3.Material:experience variety of materials such as paper, food, plastic, wire etc.

4.Technique: Exploring various possibilities of sculpt, construct and assemble sculpture.

5.Creative communication: every project will be discussed during class.

notes: 共同科9樓工藝教室上課；限16人

description.zh: 從回顧己發展180多年攝影術的藝術歷程,啟笛學子去體悟、不同的年代攝影思潮的轉換及美學價值;並進的實務操練與當代數位科技的應用結合,帶領學子更務實去瞭解及面對,當代攝影美學在後數位時代洪流中,可能的發展面相。
description.en: From the development of 180 years of photography has been the development of the artistic process, Leading students to understand the different era of photographic changes and aesthetic value; and practical practice and the application of contemporary digital technology combined to lead the students more pragmatic to understand and face , Contemporary photographic aesthetics in the post-era era of torrent, the possible development of the facade.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 介紹系統分析的基本概念及方法，深入熟悉開發一個電腦化資訊系統之方法及步驟。包含：系統分析、系統設計、系統建置、系統運轉、系統評鑑等之實施方式及步驟。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts and approaches of systems analysis including systems analysis, systems design, systems establishment, and systems evaluation and testing.

description.zh: 財務報表所反映的是企業的經營績效，不同的產業有不同的特質、不同的經營環境，即使在相同的產業中，企業若採行不同的競爭策略，在財務報表上也會有不同的表現。本課程的主要目的是要使學生了解如何透過財務報表，來評估企業的經營績效與價值。本課程將介紹以下內容：1) 基本財務報導與特別科目的報導與分析 2) 基本分析理論 3) 償債能力、獲利能力、經營能力、資本結構、現金流量的分析 4) 特殊行業的財務報表分析 5) 探討我國最近發佈的7號、34號及35號會計準則公報對企業與投資人的影響。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students evaluate the performance and measure the values of firms by financial statements. The topics of this course includes 1) financial reports and analysis of special accounting subjects; 2) basic financial statement analysis; 3) solvency, profitability, business performance, financial structure and cash flow analysis; 4) financial statement analysis of special industries 5) recent developments of GAAP.

description.zh:
企業倫理是企業經營本身的倫理，內容可以分為對內和對外兩部份。
本課程將介紹：
1、企業與員工間的勞資倫理
2. 企業與客戶間的客戶倫理
3. 企業與同業間的競爭倫理
4. 企業與股東間的股東倫理
5. 企業與社會間的社會責任
6. 企業與政府間的政商倫理
description.en:
Business ethics is the intrinsic value of enterprise. It contains two parts, inside and outside enterprise. This course will introduce 
1. Ethics between employer and employee
2. Ethics between enterprise and client
3. Ethics between enterprise and competitor
4. Ethics between enterprise and stockholder
5. Ethics between enterprise and society
6. Ethics between enterprise and government

description.zh: 為培育學生瞭解當前投資決策與理財之實作能力，透過實驗室建置的投資決策模擬競賽環境，以培養學生建立其證券投資分析、金融工具分析、企業評價及資本市場之基本與技術分析等決策能力。進一步訓練學生通過國際與國內相關的投資專業證照考試，以期達到理論與實務充份接軌之目標。
description.en: To nurture students to understand the practical skills of the current investment knowledge, through the investment decision-making simulation laboratory, students build their equity investment analysis, financial instruments, business evaluation, the fundamental and technical analysis of capital market, and other decision-making ability. Further training students to obtain international and domestic investment professional certification exams in order to achieve the goal of seamless integration of theory and practice.

description.zh: 金融科技包含兩個字，金融與科技，是近年來新興的產業趨勢，影響的層面非常廣泛，不只是金融方面，更牽涉到新興科技與物聯網。本課程將從不同的角度分析金融科技的技術內容、應用領域及商業模式，並藉智慧財產權與國內外重要公司發展的得失做一介紹，希望達到了解並運用此新興科技的目的。
description.en: FinTech includes two words: Finance and Technology. It is a new trend of industrial field. It has influence on lot of technical fields, not only finance, but also emerging technologies and IoT. This course will analyze FinTech from different angles, such as technology contents, application fields and business models. It also will utilize intellectual property and experience of FinTech leading companies to obtain decent knowledge of this new field.

description.zh: 教學目標為幫助學生瞭解衍生性金融市場的運作，如何利用，及其定價模式。內容包括選擇權市場機制的介紹、股票選擇權的特性及其交易策略、Black-Sholes模型、及風險值的討論等。
description.en: The goal is to help students understand how the derivatives markets work, how they can be used, and what determines the price. The course includes the following topics: the options market and its mechanics, properties of the stock options, the trading strategies, the Black-Sholes Model, and the Value at Risk.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹使用者經驗設計之理論與應用。藉由本課程的學習，學生能習得互動設計過程中所需要之關鍵概念 - 以使用者經驗為中心之設計。課程以人-機-境之架構為基礎進行相關知識之講授，並透過案例之研討、方法之操作以及設計實務之進行了解其應用。課程內容包含人物誌、使用者經驗與需求、互動環境、使用者研究以及認知心理基礎等。教學將以課堂講授、個案研討以及方法操作以及設計執行等方式進行，並以作業繳交以及分組討論與發表為評量方式。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the theories and application of User Experience Design (UXD). In this course, students can understand the key element, UX, of interactive design. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory, and executed through case studies, method simulation and design practice. The contents include personas, user experience and requirements, interactive scenario, user research and cognitive psychology. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, case studies, and design practice. Students are evaluated by design work, group discussion and presentation.

notes: 本系生&第2專長(B)修,上限70人

description.zh: 本課程以專案整合的思維，導引學生學習使用者腳本的設計，以及使用者經驗的分析，提出互動科技技術的分析，並以互動程式的撰寫，完成互動科技應用系統的發展與評估。
description.en: This course provides a project-oriented method for students to learn the integration of interactive programming design in the aspect of interaction design, interactive game and interactive arts project development.

notes: 選課人數上限70人(本系學生優先)

description.zh: 本課程旨在整合應用程式與設計，完成具互動媒體設計作品。為達成此目標，本課程培養學生熟悉與整合互動設計的理論、方法與應用，以具互動性的媒體設計議題，訓練學生獨立創作或分組合作設計，藉此訓練學生創意思考、應用科技與新知的實作能力，同時也可結合產學合作專案於教學活動內，達到務實致用的目標。
description.en: This course applies design and programming into interaction design projects relating to media design. To achieve this goal, students will familiarize the theories, methodology and implications of interactive media design in this course. By interaction design issues, students create and implement ideas by brainstorming through independent study or cooperative learning. For competition without any gap, industry-academic cooperation is one way to prepare student’s critical competencies same as the desired competencies required by the industry.

notes: 媒體設計組必修(限本系學生)

description.zh: 本課程旨在整合應用程式與設計，完成具互動性的視覺傳達設計作品。為達成此目標，本課程培養學生熟悉與整合互動設計的理論、方法與應用，以具互動性的視覺設計議題，訓練學生獨立創作或分組合作設計，藉此訓練學生創意思考、應用科技與新知的實作能力，同時也可結合產學合作專案於教學活動內，達到務實致用的目標。
description.en: This course applies design and programming into interaction design projects relating to visual communication design. To achieve this goal, students will familiarize the theories, methodology and implications of visual communication design in this course. By interaction design issues, students create and implement ideas by brainstorming through independent study or cooperative learning. For competition without any gap, industry-academic cooperation is one way to prepare student’s critical competencies same as the desired competencies required by the industry.

notes: 視覺傳達設計組必修(限本系學生)

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹使用者介面設計過程中所需了解之相關專業知識，配合設計實務的操作，使學生能充分了解使用者介面設計的流程以及相關的應用，始其具有能進行使用者使用者介面實務製作的能力。課程內容包含介面設計概念模式、介面使用性、人機介面設計程序、使用者需求、介面原型設計、介面設計原則以及使用者測試等。教學將以課堂講授、個案研討以及實作等方式進行，並以報告繳交與課堂發表及作品為評量依據。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the theory of user interface design, accompanying with design practice. This will allow students to understand the process of user interface design and related application, so as to be capable of practical interface design. The contents include conceptual model, interface usability, HCI process, user requirements, interface prototyping, principles of interface design and user testing. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, case study and practical work, and evaluated by students' reports, oral presentation and design work.

notes: 排一般教室(需無障礙空間),第2專長(B)修,上限70人

description.zh: 本課程主要的目標為從應用與設計的角度，切入虛擬實境產業的各種可能性。從教育應用、設計工具以及虛擬實境遊戲設計、虛擬實境互動式動畫製作等，進行探討。
description.en: The main objective of the program, is taking from the application and design perspective, cut into the possibilities of virtual reality industry. Exploring from the educational applications, design tools and virtual reality games, to virtual reality interactive animation, etc.

notes: 選課人數上限50人,專業融入服務學習

description.zh: 介紹多媒體各項基礎技術，包括文字、圖像、影像、動畫與音訊，以及各項技術的整合應用。
description.en: This course introduces the elements of multimedia design, including text, graphics, video, animation, and audio, as well as the applications of the integration of those elements.

notes: 媒體組選修,人數上限60人(本系學生優先)

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Society and Philosophy

description.zh: 為了培養學生有關社會、經濟與管理的基礎知識，特規劃了相關的核心課程，增進學生對個人與社會的認知，及對社會整體的分析與瞭解能力,進而強化社會適應能力。哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability. Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth. The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us. These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death. Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions. The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions, also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions. Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us g

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-社哲(一)

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Innovation and Entrepreneurship

description.zh: 本課程主要是教導學生將創意構想轉化為可執行的創業規劃，進而實際創業。並在創新與創業的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，我們導引學生從了解創新的本質開始，佐以實務案例介紹創業者該有的認知，並介紹創業的各種思維，進而提升學生創新與創業的能力。
description.en: This curriculum is to teach students the techniques to transform novel ideas into executable business plans and to practice entrepreneurship. Courses are provided to instruct students to understand the nature of innovation and entrepreneurship. Case studies are offered to introduce the basic knowledge to be a successful entrepreneur, and different skills and thoughts of entrepreneurship, wish the aim to enhance the students’ capabilities on innovation and entrepreneurship.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-創創(一)

description.zh: 多元英文系列課程以強化英語文實務及溝通能力為目標，提供不同主題內容及學習任務之課程。本系列課程整合語言技巧之訓練、專業內容主題之教授、及功能性之實務英文應用。課程設計主軸包括任務導向教學、主題式教學、及互動式語言訓練並導入多樣性之語言素材。修習課程前應詳細了解個別課程內容並評估個別英語應用之需求。
description.en: The Diversified English Series aims to develop students’ English communication competence through a variety of English courses. These courses integrate training of language skills, content-driven instruction and pragmatic use of English by tasks. The design of the series of courses incorporates the following syllabi: the collaborative task-based syllabus, content-based syllabus, and interactive skill-based syllabus, encompassing a wide range of topics. Selecting the best possible course is a key decision to guarantee the success of English learning. It is thus recommended that students evaluate their needs and wants and discuss the course options available with their English instructors.

notes: 請選：校院級課程/大二多元英文(一)

description.zh: 先修課程：微積分或負責教授同意。常微分方程式、線性常微分方程式、拉普拉氏轉換、級數及傅立葉級數、線性代數及矩陣、積分定理。
description.en: Introduction of the deformation, Strain and stress of structure (Beam, Column, Pressure vessel) under different loading conditions such as Tension, Compression, Shear force, Torsion and Bending moment.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。介紹結構體在受到張力、壓力、剪力、扭力及彎曲等外力狀態下之變形，分析應力、應變及變形，莫耳圓、壓力容器、樑、柱。
description.en:
Prerequisite: ME111 or Consent of Instructor
Introduction of the deformation, strain and stress of structures (Beam, Column, Pressure vessel) under several different loading conditions such as Tension, Compression, Shear force, Torsion and Bending moment.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。物質熱力學特性、改變能量形式之基本原理、熱力學第一及第二定律、可逆性與可用性、動力循環、冷凍循環、混合氣、化學反應。
description.en:
Prerequisite: Consent of Instructor
Thermodynamic Properties of Substance, Energy Forms, The First Law Thermodynamics, The Second Law of Thermodynamics, Irreversibility & Availability, Power Cycle, Refrigeration Systems, Mixtures, and Chemical Reactions.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。力、質量與加速度、質點運動學、質點動力學、功與能、衝量與動量、剛體運動、剛體系的動力學。
description.en: Force and Acceleration, Kinematics of a particle, Kinetics of a particle, Work and Energy, Impulse and Momentum, Kinematics of a Rigid Body, Kinetics of a Rigid Body.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nature

description.zh: 本課程主要是培養學生的邏輯思維能力及提升學生對自然領域學科的認識，特別規劃了生命科學概論、邏輯推理與現代科技概論等核心課程，並提供相關進階選修課程，以期同學從課程的學習中，增進學生邏輯思維能力，促進學生珍惜生命、關愛自然環境以及熱愛地球。
description.en: This course including core curricula such as the Introduction of Life Science, Logic Reasoning, and the Introduction of Modern Technology and related advanced elective courses, aims to develop students’ logic thinking and reinforce their knowledge in the field of science. This course is intended to explore students’ logic thinking, and encourage them to cherish life, protect the natural environment, and love the earth.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-自然(一)

description.zh: 多元英文系列課程以強化英語文實務及溝通能力為目標，提供不同主題內容及學習任務之課程。本系列課程整合語言技巧之訓練、專業內容主題之教授、及功能性之實務英文應用。課程設計主軸包括任務導向教學、主題式教學、及互動式語言訓練並導入多樣性之語言素材。修習課程前應詳細了解個別課程內容並評估個別英語應用之需求。
description.en: The Diversified English Series aims to develop students’ English communication competence through a variety of English courses. These courses integrate training of language skills, content-driven instruction and pragmatic use of English by tasks. The design of the series of courses incorporates the following syllabi: the collaborative task-based syllabus, content-based syllabus, and interactive skill-based syllabus, encompassing a wide range of topics. Selecting the best possible course is a key decision to guarantee the success of English learning. It is thus recommended that students evaluate their needs and wants and discuss the course options available with their English instructors.

notes: 請選：校院級課程/大二多元英文(二)

description.zh:
集總電路和克希荷夫定律（KCL,KVL），電路元件，串、並聯
電路，一階電路，二階電路，線性非時變電路分析，相量及
弦波穩態分析，耦合元件和電路，多相電路，複數頻率，頻
率響應，狀態變數法，雙埠網路，PSPICE，傅式分析及轉換，
拉式轉換。
description.en:
Lumped Circuits,KCL,KVL,Circuit elements,series & parallel
circuits,the RL&RC circuit,linear time-invarient circuit
analysis,the phasor concept & SSS analysis,magnetically coupled circuits,polyphase circuits,complex frequency, frequency response,state-variable analysis,two-port circuits
PSPICE,Fourier analysis & transforms,Laplace transforms

description.zh: 機率空間；組合分析；隨機變數；期望值與慣矩；聯合分佈隨機變數；慣矩母函數及特徵函數；大數法則及中央極限定理；隨機漫步及帕森程序。
description.en: Course Title:Probability and Statistics Description:This course is designed for students to get concepts and methods of Probability and Statistics. The main purpose of this course is establishment of the foundations of industrial management, quality control, and industrial economics.

description.zh: 基本儀器介紹；電子零件之認識；二極體電路（特性）；運算放大器；電晶體電路（特性）；A/D ，D/A 轉換器；類比乘法器。運算放大器應用；線性電壓調整器；電壓參考及電流源；電壓比較器；電壓控制振盪器；鎖相迴路；頻率－電壓轉換器；類比－數位轉換器；數位－類比轉換器；特殊裝置語言合成電路。
description.en:
Course Title:Electronics and Electronics Lab.
Description:The properties of semiconductor and fabrication of a PN
diode and BJT, and their characteristics are explained. Part 2
concentrates on analog circuit and system. Method of biasing a
discrete BJT or EET are given, and stability of the operating point is
discussed. The small-signal model for each device is abstained and used
to calculate the performance of low frequency single stage and
cascaded amplifiers. The feedback concepts of AMP. OP AMP, its
characteristics and applications are described.

description.zh:
本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括五大項：
一 常微分方程式：一階，二階，及高階常微分方程，拉譜拉斯轉換，   特殊函數。
二 向量幾何與分析：矩陣行列式及特徵問題。
三 傅立葉級數，積分及轉換。
四 偏微分方程及邊界值問題。
五 複變分析及映射轉換。
description.en:
This course intends to inbtroduce the mathematical principles and practices that today's engineers need to know. The course contents are 
1. Ordinary Differential Eqs: 1st order, 2nd order and higher    order ODEs. Laplace transform, special function.
2. Vector Algebra and Vector Analysis: Matrixs and    Determinants, Eigenvalve problems.
3. Fourier Series, Integral and Transforms.
4. Partial Differential Equations and Boundary Value    Problems.
5. Complex Analysis: complex Integration, conformal mapping    and Applications.

description.zh:
線性電路；電算放大器；二極體；非線性電路應用；接面場
效電晶體（JFET）；金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體(MOSFET)
；雙極性接面電晶體（BJT）；差動放大器；多級放大器。金
氧半電晶體；雙接面電晶體；差動及多極放大器；功率放大
器；頻率響應；回授；類比積體電路；濾波器；調諧放大器
；振盪器。
description.en:
Course Title:Electronics and Electronics Lab.
Description:The properties of semiconductor and fabrication of a PN
diode and BJT, and their characteristics are explained. Part 2
concentrates on analog circuit and system. Method of biasing a
discrete BJT or EET are given, and stability of the operating point is
discussed. The small-signal model for each device is abstained and used
to calculate the performance of low frequency single stage and
cascaded amplifiers. The feedback concepts of AMP. OP AMP, its
characteristics and applications are described.

description.zh:
1.簡介 
2.網路協定與架構
3.資料連接控制
4.線路交換技術
5.封包交換技術
6.區域網路技術
7.區域網路系統
8.網際網路協定
9.傳輸層協定
10. 網路安全
11.分散式應用
description.en:
1. Introduction
2. Protocol and Architecture
3. Data Link Control
4. Circuit Switching
5. Packet Switching
6. LAN Technology
7. LAN Systems
8. Internetwork Protocols
9. Transport Protocols
10. Network Security
11. Distributed Applications

notes: 四電二甲乙合開,預選限60人

description.zh: 基本儀器介紹；電子零件之認識；二極體電路（特性）；運算放大器；電晶體電路（特性）；A/D ，D/A 轉換器；類比乘法器。運算放大器應用；線性電壓調整器；電壓參考及電流源；電壓比較器；電壓控制振盪器；鎖相迴路；頻率－電壓轉換器；類比－數位轉換器；數位－類比轉換器；特殊裝置語言合成電路。
description.en:
Course Title:Electronics and Electronics Lab.
Description:The properties of semiconductor and fabrication of a PN
diode and BJT, and their characteristics are explained. Part 2
concentrates on analog circuit and system. Method of biasing a
discrete BJT or EET are given, and stability of the operating point is
discussed. The small-signal model for each device is abstained and used
to calculate the performance of low frequency single stage and
cascaded amplifiers. The feedback concepts of AMP. OP AMP, its
characteristics and applications are described.

description.zh:
本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括五大項：
一 常微分方程式：一階，二階，及高階常微分方程，拉譜拉斯轉換，   特殊函數。
二 向量幾何與分析：矩陣行列式及特徵問題。
三 傅立葉級數，積分及轉換。
四 偏微分方程及邊界值問題。
五 複變分析及映射轉換。
description.en:
This course intends to inbtroduce the mathematical principles and practices that today's engineers need to know. The course contents are 
1. Ordinary Differential Eqs: 1st order, 2nd order and higher    order ODEs. Laplace transform, special function.
2. Vector Algebra and Vector Analysis: Matrixs and    Determinants, Eigenvalve problems.
3. Fourier Series, Integral and Transforms.
4. Partial Differential Equations and Boundary Value    Problems.
5. Complex Analysis: complex Integration, conformal mapping    and Applications.

description.zh:
線性電路；電算放大器；二極體；非線性電路應用；接面場
效電晶體（JFET）；金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體(MOSFET)
；雙極性接面電晶體（BJT）；差動放大器；多級放大器。金
氧半電晶體；雙接面電晶體；差動及多極放大器；功率放大
器；頻率響應；回授；類比積體電路；濾波器；調諧放大器
；振盪器。

description.zh:
1.簡介 
2.網路協定與架構
3.資料連接控制
4.線路交換技術
5.封包交換技術
6.區域網路技術
7.區域網路系統
8.網際網路協定
9.傳輸層協定
10. 網路安全
11.分散式應用
description.en:
1. Introduction
2. Protocol and Architecture
3. Data Link Control
4. Circuit Switching
5. Packet Switching
6. LAN Technology
7. LAN Systems
8. Internetwork Protocols
9. Transport Protocols
10. Network Security
11. Distributed Applications

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Innovation and Entrepreneurship

description.zh: 本課程主要是教導學生將創意構想轉化為可執行的創業規劃，進而實際創業。並在創新與創業的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，我們導引學生從了解創新的本質開始，佐以實務案例介紹創業者該有的認知，並介紹創業的各種思維，進而提升學生創新與創業的能力。
description.en: This curriculum is to teach students the techniques to transform novel ideas into executable business plans and to practice entrepreneurship. Courses are provided to instruct students to understand the nature of innovation and entrepreneurship. Case studies are offered to introduce the basic knowledge to be a successful entrepreneur, and different skills and thoughts of entrepreneurship, wish the aim to enhance the students’ capabilities on innovation and entrepreneurship.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-創創(一)

description.zh: 多元英文系列課程以強化英語文實務及溝通能力為目標，提供不同主題內容及學習任務之課程。本系列課程整合語言技巧之訓練、專業內容主題之教授、及功能性之實務英文應用。課程設計主軸包括任務導向教學、主題式教學、及互動式語言訓練並導入多樣性之語言素材。修習課程前應詳細了解個別課程內容並評估個別英語應用之需求。
description.en: The Diversified English Series aims to develop students’ English communication competence through a variety of English courses. These courses integrate training of language skills, content-driven instruction and pragmatic use of English by tasks. The design of the series of courses incorporates the following syllabi: the collaborative task-based syllabus, content-based syllabus, and interactive skill-based syllabus, encompassing a wide range of topics. Selecting the best possible course is a key decision to guarantee the success of English learning. It is thus recommended that students evaluate their needs and wants and discuss the course options available with their English instructors.

notes: 請選：校院級課程/大二多元英文(三)

description.zh: 介紹含碳化合物的命名、結構與性質的基本概念。課程重點在反應機構、合成、立體化學、化學分析及儀器分析方法。
description.en: Fundamentals of structure and properties of carbon compounds. Emphasis on reaction mechanisms, synthesis, stereochemistry, as well as chemical and spectroscopic methods of analysis.

description.zh: 以數學與物理的方法來探討化學之原理，物質之結構與性質，內容包括由氣體動力論衍導熱力學之基本定律，物理平衡（相平衡）、化學平衡、溶液論、電化學、反應動力學、量子力學、光譜學、表面現象、輸送性質等。
description.en: This course deals with the principle of chemistry, structure and properties of matter by the matter matical and physical methods. Topics include the kinetic theory of gases, basis laws of thermodgnamics, physical equilibria (phase equilibria ), chemical equilibria, solutions, electrochemistry, chemical kinetics, quantum mechanics, spectroscopy, surface phenomena and transport properties etc.

description.zh: 訓練學生以實驗技巧，探討理論，認識儀器，並對實驗結果之數據與現象做評析與處理。
description.en: This course is to train students by experimental techniques and the principles of physical chemistry, and to become familiar with laboratory apparatus. Both the phenomena and data results of experiments are explained and treated.

description.zh: 介紹化工程序中物質於一系統中流進、流出間質量、能量均衡之原理與計算，使學生學習列出質能均衡之基本式子並查尋相關文獻，手冊上所登錄之物性資料以解決問題。
description.en: The course introduces the material and energy balances of the chemical process.  Students learn to define the system, practice the conservation law of mass and energy, and look up handbook for necessary information.

notes: 初選人數限制50人;50人教室

description.zh: 本課程介紹用於解析實際工程問題所需之相關數學方法 , 其內容包含:(1)一階二階及高階常微分方程 , (2)聯立常微分方程 , (3)常微分方程之冪級數解 , (4)拉普拉斯轉換.本課程介紹用於解析實際工程問題所需之相關數學方法 , 其內容包含:(1)一階二階及高階常微分方程 , (2)聯立常微分方程 , (3)常微分方程之冪級數解 , (4)拉普拉斯轉換.
description.en: This course introduces students of engineering to those areas of mathematics which are important in connection with practical engineering problems. The material in this course is arrange accordingly in four parts: (1) Fist-order, second-order and higher order differential equations. (2) Systems of differential equations. (3) Series solutions of differential equations and special function. (4) Laplace transforms.

notes: 初選人數限制50人;50人教室

description.zh: 本課程介紹自然科學的起源、近代自然科學的誕生與發展。各領域含物理學、化學、生物學、天文學、數學等，並介紹各項科學技術。
description.en: This is an introductory course concerning about the origin of nature science, the genesis and developments of the modern physics science.  The topics of physics science are physics, chemistry, biology, astronomy, and mathematics.  The contents and characteristic of various technology are also discussed in this course.

notes: 大二合開,初選人數限制55人

description.zh: 訓練學生以實驗技巧，探討理論，認識儀器，並對實驗結果之數據與現象做評析與處理。
description.en: This course is to train students by experimental techniques and the principles of physical chemistry, and to become familiar with laboratory apparatus. Both the phenomena and data results of experiments are explained and treated.

description.zh: 介紹化工程序中物質於一系統中流進、流出間質量、能量均衡之原理與計算，使學生學習列出質能均衡之基本式子並查尋相關文獻，手冊上所登錄之物性資料以解決問題。
description.en: The course introduces the material and energy balances of the chemical process.  Students learn to define the system, practice the conservation law of mass and energy, and look up handbook for necessary information.

description.zh: 本課程介紹用於解析實際工程問題所需之相關數學方法 , 其內容包含:(1)一階二階及高階常微分方程 , (2)聯立常微分方程 , (3)常微分方程之冪級數解 , (4)拉普拉斯轉換.本課程介紹用於解析實際工程問題所需之相關數學方法 , 其內容包含:(1)一階二階及高階常微分方程 , (2)聯立常微分方程 , (3)常微分方程之冪級數解 , (4)拉普拉斯轉換.
description.en: This course introduces students of engineering to those areas of mathematics which are important in connection with practical engineering problems. The material in this course is arrange accordingly in four parts: (1) Fist-order, second-order and higher order differential equations. (2) Systems of differential equations. (3) Series solutions of differential equations and special function. (4) Laplace transforms.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 多元英文系列課程以強化英語文實務及溝通能力為目標，提供不同主題內容及學習任務之課程。本系列課程整合語言技巧之訓練、專業內容主題之教授、及功能性之實務英文應用。課程設計主軸包括任務導向教學、主題式教學、及互動式語言訓練並導入多樣性之語言素材。修習課程前應詳細了解個別課程內容並評估個別英語應用之需求。
description.en: The Diversified English Series aims to develop students’ English communication competence through a variety of English courses. These courses integrate training of language skills, content-driven instruction and pragmatic use of English by tasks. The design of the series of courses incorporates the following syllabi: the collaborative task-based syllabus, content-based syllabus, and interactive skill-based syllabus, encompassing a wide range of topics. Selecting the best possible course is a key decision to guarantee the success of English learning. It is thus recommended that students evaluate their needs and wants and discuss the course options available with their English instructors.

notes: 請選：校院級課程/大二多元英文(三)

description.zh: 本課程介紹用於解析實際工程問題所需之相關數學方法 ,其內容包括：常微分方程式、線性常微分方程式、拉普拉氏轉換、級數及傅立葉級數、線性代數及矩陣、以及積分定理。
description.en: This course introduces engineering students the mathematics in practical engineering problems. The topics covered include: ordinary differential equations, linear ordinary differential equations, Laplace transforms, series and Fourier series, linear algebra, matrix, and integration theorems.

description.zh: 配合顯微組織學課程，使學生從實際顯微組織觀察中，依據相圖的理論觀念，分析和判斷材料的基本特徵。藉由應用顯微鏡設備，結合試片製作與處理的技術，從事試片構造的觀察，據此作為熱處理物件之分析，塑性加工或鑄件之研判，是為本課程的訓練目的。實習內容含括影片教學，熱電偶之測定與應用，熱分析法、以及試片的製作與處理等實作練習。
description.en: This course is to introduce Microstructure Practices.It focus on the purpose of material testing, the structure of material testing equipment, and the operation method, its content covers tensile, bending, compression, impact and various hardness test equipment, let student fully aware of operation method, to the extent of skillfulness, and it matches other curriculums to judge the specifics of the analytic materials

description.zh: 材料之結晶構造及一般性質簡介，由簡單之單成份系，二成份系，到三成份系之平衡狀態圖，解釋各平衡狀態圖之相變態過程，並以顯微組織圖作輔助說明，由簡而繁，循序漸進，使同學容易領悟。
description.en: This course is to introduce Phase Diagrams and Microstructure.

description.zh: 將熱力學定律應用於計算凝結相之化學位能與其平衡，逸壓和活性因素，溶液熱力學，多元金屬溶液，相圖和相變化，運用電腦模擬相反應和相圖，及研擬冶金數學模式。
description.en: It applies the theory of thermaldynamics to calculate chemical potential energy and its equilibrium of condensed phase, released pressure and activated factors, solution thermaldynamics, complex metal solution , phase diagram and phase change, computer-aided phase reaction and phase diagram simulation, and planning a mathmatics model of metallurgy.

description.zh: 課程主要目標，是要使工程科系，發展出以簡單而合於邏輯的方式分析任何問題，並應用一些為大家熟悉的基本原理加以解答。本課程內容分成質點力學及剛體力學兩部分，剛體力學部分又分為靜力學及動力學。除介紹力學中的基本觀念及定理外更解釋及預測各種物理現象，進而打好工程應用的基礎。提供同學分析及設計各種機件和承載荷重結構的方法，課程內容將介紹某些依據基本定理而化簡的數學模式，進而分析及設計作用在結構上的各種條件，使同學在選擇或運用材料上有安全與正確的觀念，以便在理論與經驗的配合下，順利地處理材料在工程上所發生的問題。
description.en: The major target of this course is to let the engineering students develop and analyze any questions with an easy and logical way, and to try to solve them with some well-recognized fundamental principles. The course can be divided into particle dynamics and rigid body dynamics, the latter can be further divided into statics and dynamics. Apart from introducing the fundamental concept and law, it also explains and forecasts all kinds of nature physic phenomenon, in order to establish a good foundation for engineering application science. It provides methods for students to analyze and design all kinds of machine elements, bearing load structure as well, the course content will introduce some implified math models which are based on fundamental principles, and further analyze and design all conditions to the structure , let students have a safe and exact concept in choosing and utilizing materials, so that the theory and experience can be well matched, and the problems arisen from hand.

description.zh: 專業技術不斷開創與努力，如果再配合管理經營的能力，即能相得益彰，成就非凡。工廠管理是用來探討經營或管理工廠的方法，即以工廠管理人員的立場，研究如何應用最有效的方法，來組合應用各項生產要素，以獲得工廠經營的目標。目前工業發展情況，政府的工業措施與方案，以及我國文化背景，都必須與工廠管理的方法結合，才能成為最佳的經營者。
description.en: It would be an extraordinary achievement if an endless creative professional skill can be matched with excellent management ability. This course is used to discuss the method of management or administration, that is to make a research in using the most effective approach to combine all the necessary production elements from the viewpoint of factory management class, so that the management objective can be reached. The current industry development, the initiative and policy of industry, and the culture background of this country all have to be matched with factory management strategy, thus, would become the best management once and for all.

description.zh: 本課程主要是介紹最新的製造技術。利用物理式及化學式的製造方法來加工新進材料，使用新進光電能源及新進製造工具如雷射、鑽石、電子束、離子束、電漿、化學反應劑等，適應生產微小精密工件之需求，由冶金技術製造的材料與產品包括：高熔點材料、超硬質材料、超耐熱材料、燒結機械另件、燒結摩擦材料、燒結磁性材料等，以期讓學過冶金課程的學生，能進一步對製造技術之應用有更多的了解。
description.en: Introduction to manufacturing processes, and introducing newest manufacturing technology. Applying physical and chemical manufacturing methods to process advanced materials,

description.zh: 介紹各種奈米結構材料：奈米碳管、奈米線、量子點、量子線和奈米複合材料的基本特性以及製備與應用技術，期能對奈米材料的物性、製造與應用有整體的認識。
description.en: This course will deal with the chemical and physical properties of nanomaterials. It will cover the preparation, structure, properties and applications of quantum dots and lines, carbon nanotubes, and nanocomposites.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

The design of the series of courses incorporates the following syllabi: the collaborative task-based syllabus, content-based syllabus, and interactive skill-based syllabus, encompassing a wide range of topics. Selecting the best possible course is a key decision to guarantee the success of English learning. It is thus recommended that students evaluate their needs and wants and discuss the course options available with their English instructors.

notes: 請選：校院級課程/大二多元英文(三)

description.zh: 課程主要目標，是要使工程科系，發展出以簡單而合於邏輯的方式分析任何問題，並應用一些為大家熟悉的基本原理加以解答。本課程內容分成質點力學及剛體力學兩部分，剛體力學部分又分為靜力學及動力學。除介紹力學中的基本觀念及定理外更解釋及預測各種物理現象，進而打好工程應用的基礎。提供同學分析及設計各種機件和承載荷重結構的方法，課程內容將介紹某些依據基本定理而化簡的數學模式，進而分析及設計作用在結構上的各種條件，使同學在選擇或運用材料上有安全與正確的觀念，以便在理論與經驗的配合下，順利地處理材料在工程上所發生的問題。

The course can be divided into particle dynamics and rigid body dynamics, the latter can be further divided into statics and dynamics. Apart from introducing the fundamental concept and law, it also explains and forecasts all kinds of nature physic phenomenon, in order to establish a good foundation for engineering application science. It provides methods for students to analyze and design all kinds of machine elements, bearing load structure as well, the course content will introduce some implified math models which are based on fundamental principles, and further analyze and design all conditions to the structure , let students have a safe and exact concept in choosing and utilizing materials, so that the theory and experience can be well matched, and the problems arisen from hand.

description.zh: 本課程討論，化學中相關物理量的基本理論，技巧及應用等，特別是化學熱力學及電化學等。有關氣相，氣体定理，熱量，功，熱力學第一、第二及第三定律，焓，熵，自由能，相平衡，溶液，化學平衡，酸鹼，電化學，電極，電池，半反應等基礎理論之探討。
description.en: This course discuss the fundamental theory, technique and application with regards to physical property in chemistry, especially at the chemical thermal dynamics and electrical chemistry. The research of the fundamental theory about gaseous phase, the gas laws, heat, work, the first, second and third law of the thermodynatmics, entropy, enthalpy, free energy, phase equilbrium, solution, chemicalequilbrium, acid and alkali, electrical chemistry, electrode,electric cell,half reaction ,etc.

description.zh: 本課程主要目標在介紹與實際問題相關之數學領域，以模擬解題及詮釋等方式，將數學方法應用在工程問題上。課程內容有常微分方程，線性代數，向量微積分，Fourier 分析及偏微分方程式等章節，訓練同學在理論，計算及實驗間建立正確的認知及意義。內容將繼續介紹複數分析及數值方法等章節，尤其對計算機的概念及演算法乃給予較多的強調，對實際問題亦有簡化討論。另外，在應用解決問題構想，練習例題及理論間，更有相輔相成的效果。至於線性規化，圖形組合，機率理論及數學機率等內容亦有概略介紹，務使同學有正確的認知。
description.en: The course*s main taget is to introduce math region which is relating to practical questions with simulate solution and interpretation, it applies the math method to engineering questions. The course content includes ordinary differential equation, linear algebra, vector calculus, Fourier analysis and partial differencial equation partial differential equation, with the aim to train students in establishing an exact perception to the meaning of theory, calculation and experimentation. it also introduces complex number analysis and numeric method, especially put more emphasis at the computer concept and algorithm, a simplified discussion to the practical problem as well. Besides, it has a mutual supporting effect in solving question concepts, practising model question and theory. As to the linear programming, graphs and combinatorial optimization, probability theory and mathmetical probability, this course also has a brief introduction, its target is to let all the students

description.zh: 本課程討論結晶質固體之基本概念，含晶體之幾何學及數學理論，並進一步討論結晶化學及結晶構造之原理，同時輔以電子顯微鏡法及X-射線法作結晶構造分析。
description.en: This course is to introduce Elements of Crystallography.

description.zh: 傳授學生關於礦物與岩石的組成、結構、物化性質與觀察辨認等基本知識。內容包括：礦物的物理性質、礦物的化學性質、礦物的觀察(辨識與記錄)(自然元素礦物、硫化物礦物、氧化物與氫氧化物礦物、鹵化物礦物、碳酸鹽礦物、硫酸鹽礦物、單矽酸鹽與雙矽酸鹽礦物、環矽酸鹽與鏈矽酸鹽礦物、片矽酸鹽與體矽酸鹽礦物)、主要造岩礦物介紹、火成岩觀察(辨識與記錄)、沉積岩觀察(辨識與記錄)、變質岩觀察(辨識與記錄)、岩石礦物薄片製作與觀察等。
description.en: Introduce students about minerals and rocks composition, fabric, physical and chemical properties , observation and identify the basic knowledge. They include: physical properties of minerals, chemical properties of minerals ,minerals observed (identification and record) (Native elements minerals, Sulfides and Sulfosalts minerals, Oxides and Hydroxides minerals, Halides minerals, Carbonates minerals, Sulphates and Nitrates minerals, Nesosilicates and Sorosilicates minerals, Cyclosilicates and Inosilicates minerals, Phyllosilicates and Tectosilicates minerals), the main rock-forming minerals introduction, Igneous rocks observed (identification and record), Sedimentary rocks observed (identification and record), Metamorphic rocks observed (identification and record), rock and mineral thin section preparation and observation.

description.zh: 本課程主要針對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原 理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺 陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物 理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質），材料之機械性質（強度 、延展性、硬度、韌性、疲勞、潛變），材料之強化機構與方法。
description.en: This course is a basic topics of Materials Science.

description.zh: 本課程包括環境工程原理、廢棄物處理、資源回收、水污染防治、給水工程、廢水處理、空氣污染防制、噪音防制、土壤與地下水污染等之概述。
description.en: This course includes introduction of principle of environmental engineering, water supply, wastewater treatment, solid waste treatment, resource recycling, air pollution control, noise, soil and groundwater pollution.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 多元英文系列課程以強化英語文實務及溝通能力為目標，提供不同主題內容及學習任務之課程。本系列課程整合語言技巧之訓練、專業內容主題之教授、及功能性之實務英文應用。課程設計主軸包括任務導向教學、主題式教學、及互動式語言訓練並導入多樣性之語言素材。修習課程前應詳細了解個別課程內容並評估個別英語應用之需求。
description.en: The Diversified English Series aims to develop students’ English communication competence through a variety of English courses. These courses integrate training of language skills, content-driven instruction and pragmatic use of English by tasks. The design of the series of courses incorporates the following syllabi: the collaborative task-based syllabus, content-based syllabus, and interactive skill-based syllabus, encompassing a wide range of topics. Selecting the best possible course is a key decision to guarantee the success of English learning. It is thus recommended that students evaluate their needs and wants and discuss the course options available with their English instructors.

notes: 請選：校院級課程/大二多元英文(三)

description.zh: 分別依歷史及關係、研究方向而分類基本性質。物質之基本構成原理。各以非金屬材料為主，輔以金屬材料，除以理論定義、性質、配試驗及計標來教授學習者研究瞭解如何鑑定選材適用，達到品質要求。
description.en:
Physical,chemical,and molecular properties of materials commonly employed in civil engineering works.Influence of these properties on the performance and use of materials. 
Emphasis on laboratory evaluation of properties that control the performance of materials.

description.zh: 混凝土及其材料，磚石、木材、瀝青、鋼筋等土木工程材料各種性質之試驗方法，儀器之使用及實習。
description.en: Laboratory tests of concrete and its materials, Brick and stone,Wood,Asphalt,Reinforcing steel and other materials of Civil Engineering,Include test procedures,instrumentation,and interpretation of results.

description.zh: 本課程教授材料力學之基本理論及定理包含：(1)應力與應變、(2)抗拉試驗試驗與虎克定律、(3)扭矩、(4)剪力與彎矩、(5)梁之應力分析、(6)梁之撓度、(7)柱之挫屈 。
description.en:
The contents of this course are listed as follows:
1.Stress and Strain
2.Mechanical Properties of Materials
3.Torsion
4.Pure Bending
5.Traverse Loading
6.Transformation of Stress and Strain
7.Design and Deflections of Beam and Shahts
8.Buckling of Columns
9.Energy Methods

description.zh:
1.線性聯立微分方程
2.向量分析
3.富利葉級數及富利葉積分
4.偏微分方程及邊界值問題
description.en:
This course deals with the following subjects:
Ⅰ.Ordinary Differential Equations   
Ⅱ.Laplace Tnangforms
Ⅲ.Vector Analysis
Ⅳ.Matrices and Determinants
Ⅴ.Fourier Series
Ⅵ.Partial Differential Equatians

description.zh: 介紹工程成本運算的各種方法，藉由不同的數學分析技巧推估並了解不同工程資金運用方案的差異性，以為決策評估及成本控制的依據。
description.en: Economics can be said to be satisfaction of wants by the allocation of scarce factors. Construction economy introduces various methods of financial cash flow to analyze the priority of infrastructures. Moreover, it provides a systematic framework for evaluating the economic aspects of competing design solutions.

description.zh:
為培養土木工程系大學部學生瞭解設計圖中內容，本課程採用實務的教學方式，以工程師實際面對的建築設計圖、結構設計圖、土木設計圖及機電設計圖等，加以解說圖面內容並引導學生理解設計涵義及實作演練。並結合工程知識、營建工程實務操作及專案管理領域整合的能力，使學生畢業後與業界無縫接軌。本課程主要內容如下:
1.熟悉一個工程或建案中必備之完整圖面內容
2.熟悉設計圖上各種符號、線條之用處及表示的意義
3.結構標準圖、配筋圖與施工規範之解說
4.如何依設計圖進行工程品質之查驗
5.其他與勞工安全相關知識等
description.en:
To improve undergraduate civil engineering students to understand the design drawings reading ability.  This course provides a set of design drawings, such as building, structural, civil and MEP design drawings, for instructors to explain the meaning of the design drawing, and guide the students to read the related drawings. The course also includes practical exercise for students to read the drawings, and to understand the information in the drawings. The course will also involves the knowledge of engineering to enhance the integration ability of all the design drawings for the students. The contents of this  course are listed as below:
1.To familiar with the whole set design drawings.
2.To familiar with the meaning of symbols, lines and expression in the design drawings.
3.To understand general notes, general drawings, reinforcement and specification in structural design drawings.
4.How to inspect the construction quality by the design drawings.
5.Other topics about labor-safety

Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Society and Philosophy

description.zh: 為了培養學生有關社會、經濟與管理的基礎知識，特規劃了相關的核心課程，增進學生對個人與社會的認知，及對社會整體的分析與瞭解能力,進而強化社會適應能力。哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability. Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth. The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us. These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death. Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions. The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions, also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions. Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us g

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-社哲(二)

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 多元英文系列課程以強化英語文實務及溝通能力為目標，提供不同主題內容及學習任務之課程。本系列課程整合語言技巧之訓練、專業內容主題之教授、及功能性之實務英文應用。課程設計主軸包括任務導向教學、主題式教學、及互動式語言訓練並導入多樣性之語言素材。修習課程前應詳細了解個別課程內容並評估個別英語應用之需求。
description.en: The Diversified English Series aims to develop students’ English communication competence through a variety of English courses. These courses integrate training of language skills, content-driven instruction and pragmatic use of English by tasks. The design of the series of courses incorporates the following syllabi: the collaborative task-based syllabus, content-based syllabus, and interactive skill-based syllabus, encompassing a wide range of topics. Selecting the best possible course is a key decision to guarantee the success of English learning. It is thus recommended that students evaluate their needs and wants and discuss the course options available with their English instructors.

notes: 請選：校院級課程/大二多元英文(四)

description.zh: 介紹一階常微分方程式，線性常微分方程式，及解非均勻方程式的一般方法，以及Bessel與 Strum Liouville 問題,並介紹 Laplace轉換與數值分析。
description.en: This course introduces students of engineering, physics, and mathematics to those areas of mathematics which are most important in connection with practical problems.  The contents are Ordinary Differential Equations, Linear Algebra, Fourier Analysis, and Numerical Methods.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生具備獨立思考有機化學的能力;因此課程分為基本觀念(結構式與鍵結),有機化學反應與反應機構以及化合物的製備與分析等三大部分。
description.en: The aim of this course is to educate students to think independently about organic chemistry. The course is divided into three parts;introductory material(concepts of structure and bonding);organic reactions and mechanism(sigma-bond chemistry followed by  pi-bond chemistry);and topics of more specialized interest.

description.zh: 使學生對工程力學原理之理論與應用具有清晰、完整的概念。內容涵蓋：基本觀念，力系的平衡、摩擦、慣性矩和慣性積，質點的運動學與動力學，應力和應變，扭矩、彎力矩、樑的撓曲。
description.en: The Purpose of this course is to provide the student with a clear and thorough presention of the theory and application of engineering mechanics.  The text contains general principles, equilibrium of force system, friction, moments of inertia, kinetics and dynamics of a particle, stress and strain, torsion, bending moment and bending of beam.

name.en: Textile materials and principles of textile Technology

description.zh:
1. 本課程主要說明各種紡織材料之組成和成形, 基本性質, 各種加工與應用。 
2. 本課程主要簡介紡織科技所包含之原料與製程, 製品和評估，同時訓練學生了解基本的紡織辭彙。
description.en:
1. Introduction to textile compositions, properties, spinning, processings and applications. 
2. Textile materials and related processes are introduced, and technical used are learned as well.

description.zh: 本課程介紹各種分析材料表面性質的方法。藉著利用光子、電子、原子、或離子與材料表面的物理或化學作用，來獲得有關材料表面的組成、結構、化學鍵結、電子組態於表面形貌等訊息。所要介紹的表面分析儀器包括；X光電子光譜儀(XPS)、歐傑電子光譜儀（AES）、低能電子繞射儀(LEED)、電子穿隧掃描儀(STM)、表面振動光譜儀(surface vibrational spectroscopy)、程式控溫脫附法(TPD)及真空技術。
description.en: The course introduces various surface analysis methods, including XPS, AES, LEED, STM, surface vibrational spectroscopy, and TPD.  From the physical and chemical interaction between photons、electrons、atoms and ions with surfaces, the surface properties, including surface composition, surface structure, surface topography, electronic structure, and chemical bonding will be probed.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹一系列的生物大分子及構成這些生物分子的基本分子。課程從認識細菌、植物、動物細胞及各種細胞胞器開始，接著探討蛋白質、酵素、DNA、RNA、脂質、糖類結構和功能及他們在生命中的重要性。構成蛋白質的二十種氨基酸和組成DNA或RNA的四個核甘酸及構成脂質、糖類結構的生物分子將詳細被探討。
description.en: This course is to introduce a serials of biomaterials and their functions. Begins from bacterial, plant, and animal cells and the differences between these cell organs. To learn of DNA, RNA, proteins, and enzymes base on their structures and functions. The characters of 20 amino acids and 4 nucleotides will be studied in detail. Carbohydrates and lipids are learned by their specific functions.

description.zh:
無機化學係化學三大骨架之一，日常生活中之各樣物質大部分是由無機材料製成，課程係以深入淺出方式教授，授課內容涵蓋主族元素與過渡元素。課程內容包括:原理、主族元素化學、硼族、第1, 2, 15, 16, 17 族元素、過渡元素化學、
過渡元素、第一過渡系列元素、鈦,鉻,鈷,鎳,銅
description.en: Inorganic chemistry is one of the three frames of chemistry. Various materials in our daily life are composed of inorganic materials. This course will be given in a manner of easy-getting-point. The contents comprise of chemistry of main group elements and transition elements.  The course covers the following topics: (1) Survey of principles (2) Chemistry of main group elements (A. Boron; B. Group 1, 2, 15, 16, 17 Elements) (3) Chemistry of transition elements (A. Survey of Transition Elements; B. Elements of the first transition series; C. Titanium, Chromium, Cobalt, Nickel and Copper.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Aesthetics and Arts

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的藝術涵養。透過生活美學、藝術概論與音樂概論等相關課程，引導學生探索如何從認識藝術到應用於生活。從探索視覺藝術與音樂發展的整體性，到建構欣賞和審美意涵之基礎，期望能廣泛的從「生活」中食、衣、住、行、育、樂所體現美的內容及活動，重構生活藝術化與藝術生活化的美學視野。
description.en:
The main purpose of this course is to enrich the artistic conservation of our students. Though the related course, such as Aesthetics of living, Introduction to Art Theories and Introduction to Music, which guild students to explore art into their daily life.
The Exploration of the development of visual art and music is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on arts in order to foster students to appreciate and apply it into lifestyles and social environment.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-美學(二)

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education： History and Literatural

description.zh: 本課程目標要使學生瞭解歷史與文化範疇的知識，以培養歷史思維與文化涵養，促進的歷史意識與文化鑑賞力。歷史與文化領域將提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文化的發展，剖析歷史與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgement with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan, China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-文史(三)

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 多元英文系列課程以強化英語文實務及溝通能力為目標，提供不同主題內容及學習任務之課程。本系列課程整合語言技巧之訓練、專業內容主題之教授、及功能性之實務英文應用。課程設計主軸包括任務導向教學、主題式教學、及互動式語言訓練並導入多樣性之語言素材。修習課程前應詳細了解個別課程內容並評估個別英語應用之需求。
description.en: The Diversified English Series aims to develop students’ English communication competence through a variety of English courses. These courses integrate training of language skills, content-driven instruction and pragmatic use of English by tasks. The design of the series of courses incorporates the following syllabi: the collaborative task-based syllabus, content-based syllabus, and interactive skill-based syllabus, encompassing a wide range of topics. Selecting the best possible course is a key decision to guarantee the success of English learning. It is thus recommended that students evaluate their needs and wants and discuss the course options available with their English instructors.

notes: 請選：校院級課程/大二多元英文(二)

description.zh: 瞭解工程系統中常用數學之原理及應用，內容包含：1.常微分一階、二階及高階方程式之解法，2.拉普拉斯 (Laplace)變換及其在電路上之應用，3.向量分析及其在電磁學上之應用。
description.en:
1.Ordinary differential equations of the first order
2.Linear ordinary differential equations of the second order
3.Laplace transforms
4.Vector analysis and its application to electormagnetics

description.zh:
1. 瞭解電路元件之基本特性及其組合電路之分析方法，內容包含：
(1)電路元件：電壓及電流源，主動元件，
(2)電路特性：歐姆定律，柯希荷夫電壓與電流定律等，
(3)一階及二階電路：電路之微分方程描述及各種輸入信號之響應，
(4)穩態分析與頻率響應：分析電路之頻域，
(5)電腦輔助電路分析：如使用 SPICE 工具。
2. 瞭解線性與非線性電路的組成與分析法，內容包含：
(1)交流激勵電路：交流穩態分析，功率計算及相電路，
(2)三相電路：Ｙ與△型轉換及功率分析，
(3)變壓器電路：互感應及電壓電流的變換，
(4)頻率響應分析：極點與零點，轉移函數，
(5)Fourier 級數，轉換及應用，
(6)Laplace轉換及應用。
description.en:
The course covers the synthesis and analysis of bath linear and nonlinear circuits.Contents include:
1.Introduction to linear circuit analysis, 2. Resistive circuit, 3. Kirchhoff laws, 4. Thevenin and Norton theorem, 5. First and second order circuit, 6. Node and loop analysis, 7. Steady state response and analysis, 8. SPICE tool, 9.AC circuit :AC steady-state analysis, phasor analysis, 10. Three phase circuits, 11. Transformer circuits, 12. Frequency response, 13. Fourier series, Fourier transformation and application, 14. Laplace transformation and application.

description.zh: 介紹電子零組件之組成，特性以及其應用，使學生具有實用電路之分析模擬與設計應用之能力，內容涵蓋：1.半導体物理，2.基本主動元件(二極体，雙極性電晶体，場效電晶体)，3.放大器電路，4.邏輯(數位)電路，5.積体電路。
description.en: 1.Semiconductor physics 2.Diode 3.Bipolar Junction transistor 4.Field-efferct 5.Operatonal amplifier 6.Digital logic circuit 7.Integrated circuit

description.zh: (1)半導體二極體特性曲線; (2)半導體二極體之應用:整流器,濾波器,剪波器,箝位器,倍壓器; (3)發光二極體驅動電路; (4)齊納二極體穩壓電路; (5)雙極接合面電晶體之辨別與參數量測; (6)雙極接合面電晶體輸入及輸出特性曲線; (7)雙極接合面電晶體直流偏壓電路; (8)共射極放大電路; (9)射極隨耦電路; (10)共基極定電流源電路; (11)場效電晶體之辨別與參數量測; (12)場效電晶體轉移及輸出特性曲線; (13)場效電晶體直流偏壓電路; (14)場效電晶體放大電路; (15)整流及濾波電路; (16)偏壓分析與設計; (17)基本放大器(共射，共基，共集模式，共源，共汲，共閘等); (18)串級放大器; (19)差動放大器。
description.en: (1)The characteristic curve of PN diode; (2)The applications of PN diode : Rectifier, Filter, Clipper, Clamper, and Voltage-doubler; (3)Light Emitting Diode drivers; (4)Zener diode for voltage regulation; (5)The identification of BJT's leads and the measurement of b parameter; (6)The input and output characteristic curves of BJTs; (7)DC biasing circuits for BJTs; (8)Common-Emitter(CE) amplifiers; (9)Emitter-follower(EF) circuits; (10)Common-Base(CB) constant current sources; (11)The identification of FET's leads and the measurement of device parameters; (12)The transfer and output characteristic curves of FETs; (13)DC biasing circuits for FETs; (14)The amplifying circuits of FETs; (15)Retifier circuit and Filter; (16)Bias analysis and design; (17)Common Emitter amplifier, Common base amplifier, Common collector amplifier; (18)Differential amplifier.

name.zh: 微算機原理及應用實習

description.zh: 瞭解微算機之基本組織架構及應用，內容包含：1.PC之使用，2.微電腦學習機之使用，3.邏輯分析儀之使用，4.組合語言之設計與除錯，5.記憶體設計ROM/RAM，6.輸出入埠設計及程式控制，7.輸出入埠應用(鍵盤介面、LED顯示介面)，8.A/D、D/A介面設計，9.簡單PC介面卡設計(PIO及SIO)介面，單晶片之設計與應用。
description.en:
The experiment covers the basic architecture and application 
of microcomputer.The lab. work includes:
1.The usage of PC
2.The usage of microcomputer training machine
3.Logic analysis
4.The design and debug of assembly language
5.ROM/RAM design
6.I/O design and control 
7.A/D, D/A design
8.PC interfacing design
9.Single-chip microcomputer system design

description.zh:
1.集合,序列與函數
2.基礎邏輯
3.關聯式
4.計數（排列,組合）
5.圖與樹（基礎圖論）
6.遞迴式與演算法
7.有向圖
description.en:
1.Sets Sequences and Function
2.Elementary Logic
3.Relations
4.Counting
5.Graph and Tree
6.Recursion Trees and Algorithms
7.Digraphs

description.zh:
1.通訊工程簡介
2.調幅與調頻
3.傳輸與接收系統
4.衛星通訊簡介
5.數據通訊簡介
6.光纖通訊簡介
7.電話系統簡介
8.行動通訊簡介
description.en:
1.Introductions
2.Amplitude and Frequency Modulations
3.Radio Transmitters and Receivers
4.Introduction to Satellite Communications
5.Introduction to Data Communications
6.Introduction to Fiber-Optic Communications
7.Introduction to Telephone System
8.Introduction to Cellular System

description.zh: 瞭解微算機及介面設計之基本觀念與應用，內容包含：1.微算機概論，2.中央處理單元架構、程式規劃及記體模式，3.微算機指令集及定址模式，4.組合語言程式設計，5.硬體介面概論，6.記憶體介面(ROM及RAM)介面，7.輸出入介面、中斷處理及直接記憶體存取，8.微算機系統概述及發展系統簡介。
description.en:
1.Introduction to microcomputer
2.Central processor unit 
3.Microprogramming set
4.Assemblylanguage programming
5.Interfacing circuits
6.ROM/RAM interface
7.I/O operations
8.Interrupt and direct memory access

description.zh: 本課程將結合理論說明與示範實習，使同學對雷射基本原理及光電科技應用有一完整的認識，內容包括：1.光電工程概論，2.基礎光學，3.電射發光原理，4.雷射光的調製，5.光電科技應用概論。
description.en:
The course covers bath lectures and lab exercise
1.Introduction 
2.Fundamentals of optics
3.Laser principles
4.Electrooptic modulation of laser beams
5.Applications of electrooptic techniques

description.en: 1.Semiconductor physics 2.Diode 3.Bipolar Junction transistor 4.Field-efferct 5.Operatonal amplifier 6.Digital logic circuit 7.Integrated circuit

description.zh: (1)半導體二極體特性曲線; (2)半導體二極體之應用:整流器,濾波器,剪波器,箝位器,倍壓器; (3)發光二極體驅動電路; (4)齊納二極體穩壓電路; (5)雙極接合面電晶體之辨別與參數量測; (6)雙極接合面電晶體輸入及輸出特性曲線; (7)雙極接合面電晶體直流偏壓電路; (8)共射極放大電路; (9)射極隨耦電路; (10)共基極定電流源電路; (11)場效電晶體之辨別與參數量測; (12)場效電晶體轉移及輸出特性曲線; (13)場效電晶體直流偏壓電路; (14)場效電晶體放大電路; (15)整流及濾波電路; (16)偏壓分析與設計; (17)基本放大器(共射，共基，共集模式，共源，共汲，共閘等); (18)串級放大器; (19)差動放大器。
description.en: (1)The characteristic curve of PN diode; (2)The applications of PN diode : Rectifier, Filter, Clipper, Clamper, and Voltage-doubler; (3)Light Emitting Diode drivers; (4)Zener diode for voltage regulation; (5)The identification of BJT's leads and the measurement of b parameter; (6)The input and output characteristic curves of BJTs; (7)DC biasing circuits for BJTs; (8)Common-Emitter(CE) amplifiers; (9)Emitter-follower(EF) circuits; (10)Common-Base(CB) constant current sources; (11)The identification of FET's leads and the measurement of device parameters; (12)The transfer and output characteristic curves of FETs; (13)DC biasing circuits for FETs; (14)The amplifying circuits of FETs; (15)Retifier circuit and Filter; (16)Bias analysis and design; (17)Common Emitter amplifier, Common base amplifier, Common collector amplifier; (18)Differential amplifier.

name.zh: 微算機原理及應用實習

description.zh: 瞭解微算機之基本組織架構及應用，內容包含：1.PC之使用，2.微電腦學習機之使用，3.邏輯分析儀之使用，4.組合語言之設計與除錯，5.記憶體設計ROM/RAM，6.輸出入埠設計及程式控制，7.輸出入埠應用(鍵盤介面、LED顯示介面)，8.A/D、D/A介面設計，9.簡單PC介面卡設計(PIO及SIO)介面，單晶片之設計與應用。
description.en:
The experiment covers the basic architecture and application 
of microcomputer.The lab. work includes:
1.The usage of PC
2.The usage of microcomputer training machine
3.Logic analysis
4.The design and debug of assembly language
5.ROM/RAM design
6.I/O design and control 
7.A/D, D/A design
8.PC interfacing design
9.Single-chip microcomputer system design

description.zh:
1.集合,序列與函數
2.基礎邏輯
3.關聯式
4.計數（排列,組合）
5.圖與樹（基礎圖論）
6.遞迴式與演算法
7.有向圖
description.en:
1.Sets Sequences and Function
2.Elementary Logic
3.Relations
4.Counting
5.Graph and Tree
6.Recursion Trees and Algorithms
7.Digraphs

description.zh: 瞭解微算機及介面設計之基本觀念與應用，內容包含：1.微算機概論，2.中央處理單元架構、程式規劃及記體模式，3.微算機指令集及定址模式，4.組合語言程式設計，5.硬體介面概論，6.記憶體介面(ROM及RAM)介面，7.輸出入介面、中斷處理及直接記憶體存取，8.微算機系統概述及發展系統簡介。
description.en:
1.Introduction to microcomputer
2.Central processor unit 
3.Microprogramming set
4.Assemblylanguage programming
5.Interfacing circuits
6.ROM/RAM interface
7.I/O operations
8.Interrupt and direct memory access

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Innovation and Entrepreneurship

description.zh: 本課程主要是教導學生將創意構想轉化為可執行的創業規劃，進而實際創業。並在創新與創業的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，我們導引學生從了解創新的本質開始，佐以實務案例介紹創業者該有的認知，並介紹創業的各種思維，進而提升學生創新與創業的能力。
description.en: This curriculum is to teach students the techniques to transform novel ideas into executable business plans and to practice entrepreneurship. Courses are provided to instruct students to understand the nature of innovation and entrepreneurship. Case studies are offered to introduce the basic knowledge to be a successful entrepreneur, and different skills and thoughts of entrepreneurship, wish the aim to enhance the students’ capabilities on innovation and entrepreneurship.

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-創創(一)

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 多元英文系列課程以強化英語文實務及溝通能力為目標，提供不同主題內容及學習任務之課程。本系列課程整合語言技巧之訓練、專業內容主題之教授、及功能性之實務英文應用。課程設計主軸包括任務導向教學、主題式教學、及互動式語言訓練並導入多樣性之語言素材。修習課程前應詳細了解個別課程內容並評估個別英語應用之需求。
description.en: The Diversified English Series aims to develop students’ English communication competence through a variety of English courses. These courses integrate training of language skills, content-driven instruction and pragmatic use of English by tasks. The design of the series of courses incorporates the following syllabi: the collaborative task-based syllabus, content-based syllabus, and interactive skill-based syllabus, encompassing a wide range of topics. Selecting the best possible course is a key decision to guarantee the success of English learning. It is thus recommended that students evaluate their needs and wants and discuss the course options available with their English instructors.

notes: 請選：校院級課程/大二多元英文(四)

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train student and to provide a background in the theory and methodology of general statistical issues. Topics include probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train student and to provide a background in the theory and methodology of general statistical issues. Topics include: probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

description.zh: 使學生建立邏輯量化思考，並了解管理科學解決問題之方法及應用，且有能力利用電腦工具協助分析經營管理問題，達成最佳化決策。
description.en: To build the quantitative logic thinking about the decision problems. The course is designed to introduce the fundamental techniques and methods of operations research. The related software will be utilized to aid in building and solving models. The topics to be covered: linear programming, what-if analysis, dual theory, transportation and assignment.

description.zh: 近年來，網路社群迅速發展，電子商務經營已經是每個企業必要的市場競爭與顧客經營中，不可或缺的重要工具。因此，本課程中將以如何設計及管理其中的多媒體內容為課程主要內容。
description.en: The content of this course will teach  how to design the multimedia in the e-commerce.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

description.zh: 本課程旨在使學生瞭解各種製造的方法和程序，工具機之基本功能。其內容包含有鑄造、精密鑄造、塑膠加工、熱加工、冷加工、工具機基本元件、金屬切削、工具機的操作、粉末加工及測量。
description.en:
This course is intended to provide a comprehensive study of the Modern manufacturing processes and machine tools .The course is designed principally to provide the following topics:
1. engineering of materials
2. forming of materials 
3. traditional casting processes
4. broaching and sawing
5. turning and boring
6. drilling and reaming
7. milling and grinding
8. machine tools 
9. nontraditional machining

description.zh: 介紹資料庫系統之基本概念，熟悉基本指令及操作方法，使之能輕易建立資料檔案，並可對其資料進行擷取、添加、刪除、修改、編輯、排序、建立索引及產生標準報表列印等，且開發一套簡易應用軟體。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of database system.  The students can understand the operation process in order to develop the data file.  In addition, the retrieval, add, delete, modify, edit and sorting of data files are also provided.  Finally, the students can develop a DBMS for themselves.

name.zh: 雲端應用程式開發與應用

description.zh: 雲端運算所衍生出的商機有軟體服務（SaaS，Soft as Service）、平台服務（PaaS，Platform as Service）、設備服務（IaaS，Infrastructure as Service），相關的架構及服務也不斷地被提出，未來如智慧型手機、智慧家庭、工業4.0及大數據分析等都可以透過雲端運算，發展出更多的應用服務。希望可以透過此課程，能讓學生獲得雲端運算的基礎技術，以及雲端應用程式開發與服務建置。
description.en: This is an introduction course of cloud-based computing. The course is designed principally to provide the Followings topics: 1. fundamentals of cloud technology; and applications, 2. Cloud-based application development 3. Cloud-based platform Introduction

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Society and Philosophy

description.zh: 為了培養學生有關社會、經濟與管理的基礎知識，特規劃了相關的核心課程，增進學生對個人與社會的認知，及對社會整體的分析與瞭解能力,進而強化社會適應能力。哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability. Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth. The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us. These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death. Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions. The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions, also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions. Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us g

notes: 請選：通識中心/博雅核心-社哲(三)
