"Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.

This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

description.zh: 本課程旨在瞭解設計的基本要素與美的形式原理，應用各種媒材的特性與構成，從平面及立體的構成的實作練習中，激發出設計美感與創造力。透過「使用者—產品—環境」三者間互動關係的深入探討，掌握住視覺傳達與多媒體的基本語彙，作為互動設計的基礎，創造出全新的體驗與感受。
description.en: The course is to prepare students for understanding the basic elements of design and the form and principle of art. To achieve these goals, the course provides opportunities for students to apply characteristics and compositions of diverse media for the form of two-dimension and three-dimension in practice. Also, the course arouses student’s design aesthetics and creativity. To explore the context of user-product-environment, students understand visual communication and multimedia language as a basis of interaction design toward completely new experiences and sensation.

notes: 限本系生修課,轉學生皆需先修完此課

description.zh: 課程規劃的目標為以互動設計的理論為基礎，實務導向為原則，使學習者能將學術界的理論與產業界的實務加以結合以充實對於互動設計具有的了解。學習的內容包含互動設計系統構成要素、實務與理論基礎、方法與技術、科技支援與應用等單元，各單元並包含不同互動設計個案的研討，使理論能與實務進行驗證。課程亦安排至相關領域業界的參訪以及互動相關展覽參觀，以加深對於互動設計實務的印象與了解。
description.en: The course aims to develop broad understanding on interaction design for students, based on theory and practice course structure. Course topics include essential factors of interactive system, interaction design theory and practice, methods and techniques, technical support and application. Course also incorporates case studies, company visits and exhibitions relevant to interaction design to enhance the understanding of integrating theory and practice.

notes: 第2專長(A/B),選課人數上限70人

description.zh: 應用設計手繪工具與技法於各種設計作品圖面呈現，培養學生對空間、形體、材質、介面、裝置、比例等簡潔繪畫技巧與圖示性設計圖表達能力。
description.en: Students will learn to sketch by hand in various tools and technologies on design drawings. The simple painting tips as, spatial perceptive, presentation of form and materials, interfaces media types and installations, and proportion as well as abilities of the infographic design presentation will be taught in this class.

notes: 修課人數上限70人(限本系生)

description.zh: 介紹數位向量繪圖的基礎原理與應用。
description.en: Introduction to the digital techniques and applications of vector graphics in visual arts.

notes: 限媒體設計-資電類組選修(視覺傳達設計組不可修)限20

description.zh: 介紹電腦輔助設計的基本概念與技術。
description.en: Introduction to the fundamental concepts and technologies for Computer-Aided Design.

notes: 視覺傳達設計組&第2專長(A)修,上限50人

description.zh: 透過原理解說與系統實作，使學生熟悉Http運作原理、動態網頁製作、及資料庫系統設計等相關技術，以奠定開發網際網路應用系統所需之學理與實務基礎。課程內容包括：1. Visual Studio .Net 開發環境簡介 2. Html網頁設計 3. ActiveX網頁設計 4. VB Script程式設計 5. http Server/CGI工作原理 6. Active Server Page (ASP) 動態網頁設計 7. 資料庫系統開發環境簡介 8. Web資料庫應用系統設計 9. 進階資料庫應用設計 10. 網站管理介面設計 11. 行動網際網路應用系統設計 12. 期末專題設計
description.en: To familiarize the students with the Internet related techniques and web application systems design. Topics include: 1. Visual Studio .Net 2. HTML Page Design 3. ActiveX Page Design 4. VBScript Programming 5. CGI Programming 6. Active Server Page Design 7. Database System Concept 8. Web Database Application System Design 9. Advanced Database Application System 10. Web Administration System Design 11. Mobile Web System Design 12. Term Project

notes: 新聘兼任吳庭育老師(上限55人)。科1223LAB

description.zh:
材料之特性取決於材料內部組織，所以課程內容也注重內部組織與材料特性之間的關係，內部組織的變化對材料特性之影響，由理論為基礎之探討至實際之應用上。對本課程有關的基本概念，則詳加說明，初學材料者能得到材料上所必備之基本知識，若基本概念已有充分了解，則利用這些知識即可參考材料規格或手冊就可得到欲知之條件，進而以此概念作基礎，亦可研習更高深之學問，本課程內容著重於介紹材料之結構，基本原理有： 1. 金屬之基本理論，金屬及合金之構造，材料之組織，塑性加工變形之理論，材料之物理化學，機械性質及其實驗。 2. 鋼和鐵之製造，組織及其熱處理，變態理論。 3. 構造用鋼，合金鋼，工具鋼，特殊鋼之特性、用
途及其熱處理方法。4. 鋼之表面硬化理論及其熱處理方法。 5. 鑄鐵之冶煉，種類及其熱處理方法。6.非鐵金屬材料，銅，鋁，鈦，鎂，錫，鋅，鉛，鎳等合金種類之特性及其處理方法。
description.en:
The chacteristics of material depend on the inside tissue, therefore, the content also
put more emphasis on the relationship between the inside tissue and material chacter-
istics, how the change of inside tissue influences it in full details from the discussion 
of the theory basis to practical application. It has a detail description to the basic idea
of this course, the novice may get requisite fundamental knowledge. Once they fully
perceive these basic ideas, they may refer to material specification or manual to get
the conditions they request, or they may use these fundation to further explore
advanced knowledge.

description.zh: 介紹電機、電子以及電機機械的基礎概念。內容包括(1)電機工程介紹，(2)電子電路基本原則：電荷、電流、電壓、功率、科希荷夫定律、歐姆定律，(3)電阻性網路分析：節點電壓和網目電流、重疊定理、戴維寧和諾頓等效電路，(4)交流網路分析：介紹儲能元件並分析由正弦電壓及電流所驅動的電路，(5)暫態分析：探討在不同穩態條件下，電壓及電流的行為，(6)交流電源：簡單交流電源的計算，以及電力的產生及分配。
description.en: Introduce to the principles of electrical, electronic, and electromechanical engineering. The context contains: (1) Introduction to electrical engineering, (2) Fundamentals of electric circuits: electric, current, voltage, power, and Kirchhoff's current and voltage laws, (3)Resistive network analysis: node analysis, mesh analysis, the principle of superposition, Thevenie and Norton equivalent circuits, (4)AC network analysis: energy storage circuit elements and the analysis of AC circuits excited by sinusoidal voltages and currents, (5)Transient analysis: describe the behavior of a voltage or a current between two distinct steady-state conditions, (6)AC power: simple AC power calculations and the generation and distribution of electric power.

description.zh:
具有半流體特性的粉體，其在產業上之應用範圍相當地廣，可說是
涵蓋了所有的產業。其中在礦業、窯業、陶瓷業、水泥業、冶金業
等工業與粉體工程有密切關係。所以，研習本課程主要的目的是讓
學生對錯綜複雜的粉體問題，能有基本上的認識與了解。本課程安
排的內容包括：粉粒體的定義、粉體之生成、粉體之構造與特性、
粉體的物性、粉體的分離、混合、貯藏、輸送、計測與工業安全衛
生等項目。
description.en:
With the characteristics of semi-fluid, powder has a wide variety of applications,
it covers all industries. Among of them, mineral, kiln, ceramics, cement, metallurgy
industry have a very close relationship with powder industry. Therefore, the major
purpose of this course is to let student have basic perception and understanding to
the complex powder problems.The content of this course includes the definition
of powder body, the formation of powder body, the structure and characteristics
of powder body, the property of powder body, the separation, mixting, storage,
transportation and measurement of powder body, and industry safety and sanitation
.

description.zh: 主要介紹陶瓷之製程及所應用的範圍.
description.en: Introduction to The processes of ceramics materials and their application

description.zh:
課程綱要：
1.半導體元件簡介
2.物理氣相沉積
3.化學氣相沉積
4.微影─光阻覆蓋，曝光，顯影
5.蝕刻─濕式蝕刻，乾式蝕刻
6.攙雜─擴散法，離子植入法
7.氧化和熱處理製程
description.en:
Course Outline：
1.Introduction to Semiconductor Device
2.Physical Vapor Deposition
3.Chemical Vapor Deposition
4.Photolithography─photoresist coating, exposure, development
5.Etching─wet etching, dry etching
6.Doping─diffusion, ion implantation
7.Oxidation and Thermal Treatment Process

description.zh: 本課程包含1.複合材料的基礎知識：如複合材質及複合過程，複合構造及組織、複合材料的力學性質等基本知識。2.各種複合材料的 介紹，如炭素纖維強化複合材料金屬等複合材料等，原理及應用之 介紹。3.對於尖端技術領域之應用。複合材料大致可區分為高分子 基複材，金屬基複材，陶瓷基複材及纖維複材四種。纖維複材中， 可依強度，韌性和成本需求而選用玻璃纖維、硼纖維、碳纖維、有 機纖維、陶瓷纖維、金屬纖維等作為強化元件。上述各種複材製造 方法，介面結構，機械性質，應用，微觀力學、巨觀力學、強度、 破裂、疲勞和設計均為討論內容。
description.en: The course includes the following items: 1.The basic knowledge of composite materials such as composite materials, composite process and composite structure and tissue, the dynamics property of composite materials. 2.The introduction of all kinds of composite materials, such as the principle and application of reinforced composite material of carbon-fiber. 3.The application of composite materials at the most advanced area.The composite materials approximately can be classified into polymer base composite material, metal base composite material, ceramic base composite material, and fibre composite material. The fiber composite material can be selected as reinforced parts according to strength, toughness and cost requirement, such as glassfiber, boronfiber, carbonfiber, organic fiber, ceramic fiber, metal fiber.The above-mentioned manufacturing method, interface structure, mechanical property, application, microdynamics, macrodynamics, strength, fracture, fatigue and design are all the c

description.zh: 本課程之設計，在介紹學生資訊安全的概念，並瞭解相關的技術與應用。本課程包括下列主題：資訊安全簡介、傳統加密法、私鑰加密技術、公鑰加密技術與雜湊函數、訊息認證編碼與協定、認證系統、電子郵件安全技術、網際網路協定安全技術、全球資訊網安全技術、系統安全技術、防火牆系統等。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with the knowledge and techniques essential in information security. The topics to be covered include: introductions to information security, conventional encryption, private key technologies, public key technologies and hash functions, message authentication code and protocols, authentication systems, Kerberos, X.509 7, E-Mail security, PGP, S/MIME, IP security, Web security, SHTTP, SSL (Secure Session Layer), system security, and firewall systems.

description.zh: 人類在從事數學演算、推理交談、觀察等各類動作時，均展現出 "智慧"的現象。人工智慧即是利用電腦結合基本理論在有限度的範圍內從事上述各項工作，其中涵蓋了－自然語言了解、機器人學、電腦視覺、類神經網路、專家系統、自動化定理證明等，而本課程則主要在於提供必要之基礎，主要內容包括：1.搜尋法則，2. 命題與敘述邏輯，3. 定理證明，4. 知識系統與知識表達， 5. 機器學習， 6. 基因與演化計算，7. 智慧型代理人。
description.en: Artificial intelligence seeks to introduce the elements of intelligence into programs and systems in application domain. Topics will include 1. Searching methods 2. Propositional and Predicate logic 3. Theorem Proving 4. Knowledge-based systems and representation of knowledge 5. Machine learning, 6. Genetic algorithms and evolutionary computing, 7. Intelligent agents.

name.en: Design and Analysis of Computer Algorithms

description.zh: 1. 數學基礎 1.1 函數成長率之漸近性質 1.2 遞迴關係之解 1.3 數學歸納法 2. 基本分析技巧 2.1 計算複雜度之上下限2.2 最差情況分析及平均情況分析 2.3 動態平均分析 3. 基本設計技巧 3.1 分擊法 3.2 貪婪法 3.3 動態規劃 3.4 隨機演算法 4. 計算複雜度 4.1 資訊理論證明法 4.2 對抗式證明法 4.3 問題之線性轉換 4.4 完全NP
description.en: 1. Mathematical background 1.1 Asymptotic growth rate of functions 1.2 Solving recurrence relations 1.3 Mathematical induction 2. Basic analysis techniques 2.1 Computational complexities -- lower bounds and upper bounds 2.2 Worst case analysis and average case analysis 2.3 Amortized analysis 3. Basic Design Paradigms 3.1 Divide and conquer 3.2 Greedy methods 3.3 Dynamic programming 3.4 Probabilistic algorithms 4. Computational Complexity 4.1 Information-theoretic arguments 4.2 Adversary arguments 4.3 Linear reduction of problems 4.4 NP-completeness

notes: 資工四、資工所和電資國際班合開

description.zh:
學習如何描述軟體需求及發展滿足特定需求之系統規格。本課程將涵蓋下列主題：
��	需求引出
��	需求分析
��	需求塑模與描述
��	需求確認與驗證
��	品質需求
description.en:
Students will learn how to describe requirements for software and develop specifications for the system that meets the given requirements. This course will cover the following topics:
��	Requirement elicitation
��	Requirement analysis
��	Requirement modeling and description
��	Requirements validation and verification
��	Quality requirements

notes: 資工四、資工所和電資國際班合開

name.zh: 嵌入式智慧影像分析與實境界面
name.en: Embedded Computing Systems for Intelligent Image Analytics and Interactive Systems

description.zh: 本課程主要內容為：1.嵌入式智慧計算系統、2.嵌入式影像處理技術、3.影像辨識技術、4.人工智慧辨識技術、5.實境互動界面技術，並整合實務議題之專案開發。
description.en: The course contents include: 1. Embedded Computing Systems; 2. Embedded image processing techniques; 3. Image recognition techniques; 4. Artificial intelligence techniques for image analytics; 5. AR-based interactive systems; 6. Practical Projects

notes: 資工四、資工所合開；限15人,專業融入服務學習

description.zh: 本課程介紹在數位影像處理領域中會使用到的基本觀念與技術. 數位影像處理有非常多重要的應用, 如: 影像內容改善, 工業檢測, 機器知覺等. 課程內容包括: 1.數位影像處理的基礎 2.影像的轉換 3.影像的加強 4.影像的復原 5.彩色影像的處理6.影像的壓縮 7.影像的分割與特徵抽取 8.影像的表達及描述 9.影像的辨認與解釋
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce the basic concepts and techniques used in the field of digital image processing (IP). Digital Image Processing has many important applications, for example, image contents improvement, industrial inspection, machine perception. The outline of this course is: 1.Digital image fundamentals 2.Image transforms 3.Image enhancement 4. Image restoration 5. Color image processing 6. Image compression 7. Image segmentation and feature detection 8. Representation and description 9. Recognition and interpretation.

notes: 資工三、資工四、資工所合開(人數各限20人)

description.zh: 本課程是針對近代生物學感興趣的學生所設計，內容涵蓋生命與能量、細胞與分子生物學、生物多樣性、動植物的結構與功能、遺傳訊息的傳遞、生命的演化與生態。讓學生瞭解生命體系的輪廓，為生物科技的基礎課程。
description.en: A one-term introductory course intended for students interesting in modern life science. This course will cover topics in energy and life, cellular and molecular biology, biological diversity, structure and function of plant and animal, and transmission genetics. Principles of evolution and ecology will also be covered.

notes: 博雅選修必選自然向度

description.zh: 本課程是針對近代生物學感興趣的學生所設計，內容涵蓋生命與能量、細胞與分子生物學、生物多樣性、動植物的結構與功能、遺傳訊息的傳遞、生命的演化與生態。讓學生瞭解生命體系的輪廓，為生物科技的基礎課程。

This course will cover topics in energy and life, cellular and molecular biology, biological diversity, structure and function of plant and animal, and transmission genetics. Principles of evolution and ecology will also be covered.

notes: 博雅選修必選自然向度

description.zh:
生物工程和醫療技術的研究和發展，在最近幾十年中，促成明確的臨床醫學和衛生保健的進步。這些領域的發展，開啟了生物工程、臨床技術和醫學信息領域課程的蓬勃發展；目前，各大學及研究所多有提供這些領域的課程。然而，大多數參與者多來自工程背景，因此學習生物科學和醫學應用於工程思維及模式，方能使得工程師和醫生之間的科學能無礙地交流。
這項課程主要是為了使主修工程及材料的學生提供具有實用性的人體結構和組織的原則及相互依存的細胞和組織器官的生理系統進行有用的學習。雖然課程可能無法全然覆蓋所有生物醫學工程領域的基礎，但在這個學習過程中，我們將專注於大多數生物醫學工程以及生技和組織工程從事的主要研發領域作出努力。這門課程是醫學和工程及材料之間的橋樑。這將是促進各類工程及設計師和醫事人員之間文化和科學的交通和相互研習課程，促進生物醫學工程的創新發現和發展。在這個過程中，我們將提供一系列的生物學和醫學知識和方法，應用在工程、材料和電子領域，旨在幫助他們能將其整和連接，可以開始從工程進入生物醫學工程的專業，或者提供工程師期許能“簡單”理解特定臨床醫療科學和技術。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，將結合工程及材料師長的經
description.en:
Research and development in bioengineering and medical technology, conducted during recent decades, have led to spectacular progress in clinical medicine and healthcare. These achievements have triggered an enormous increase in the number courses offered in the areas of bioengineering, clinical technology and medical informatics; nowadays, most major universities offer curricula oriented towards these fields. The majority of participants however come from engineering background and so modules dealing with basic biological and medical sciences have been included, to the detriments of scientific exchanges between engineers and medical doctors. 
This study is primarily to give those majoring in the electronic and engineering students a useful glimpse of the principles of human structure and organization and of the interdependence of cellular and organ physiological systems. Although it is no possible to cover all of the biomedical engineering domains in this course, we will have made an e

notes: 大三、四與研究所合開,限15人

description.zh: 利用化學方法進行地質探勘
description.en: ntroduction to geochemical exploration

description.zh: 本課程討論，利用儀器分析工作之理論，儀器之原理，構造操作及計算等。包括光譜化學，原子吸收光譜，電漿發射光譜儀，發光光譜儀，電分析化學，PH計，電解沉澱法，伏安法，極譜儀，等儀器之探討。
description.en: This course discusses the theoryof instrumental analysis operation, the principle of instrument, structural operation and calculation. It includes spectrum chemistry, atomic absorption spectrograph, plasma jet spectrograph, light spectrograph, electric analytic chemistry, PH meter, electrolytic precipatation, volt ampere, polar spectrograph, etc..

description.zh: 針對地理資訊系統 之概念與技術基礎作一基本瞭解。學習範圍包括城市資訊系統、天然資源及環境管理系統、緊急救援系統等。並學習地理資訊系統 軟體操作與技巧之訓練。
description.en: Conceptual & technical foundations of geographical information systems. Applications covered include: urban information systems, natural resources & environmental management systems & emergency response systems. Laboratory sessions focus on acquiring basic skills in using GIS software with real world data.

description.zh: 炸藥與爆破工程應用於岩石爆破，為採礦及大地工程的基本作業。本課程之目的在介紹炸藥性質、炸藥反應原理、爆材特性及應用、爆破設計及施工並兼及爆破作業之環境控制。
description.en:
The blasting engineering course focuses on the introduction of explosives and their properties and characteristics, 
explosives and blasting theories, drilling and blasting 
design and operations, and environemtnal control of 
blasting.

description.zh:
本課程以講授廢棄物之中間處理與最終處置之方法與技術為主,使學生瞭
                                         解廢棄物妥善清除處理之原理,此包括: 1.廢棄物種類與含義2.廢棄物分類
                                         收集與清運3.焚化處理4.固化處理 5.掩埋處置6.特殊處理方法7.廢棄物處理
                                         廠之規劃.
description.en:
To promote the knowledge of principle for students,the course ,Waste Treatment and
                                         Disposal,focuses on middle treatment and final disposal of waste. Contents of the
                                         course include:Definition and classification of waste.Storage and
                                         transportation,Incineration,Fixation,Landfill and Overall planning of treatmrnt plant.

description.zh: 本課程主要著重於讓學生瞭解在日常生活中，食衣住行育樂等活動與化學之相互關係。尤其對在生活中所接觸之食品、衣著、環境與用品應有所認識，並以化學觀點了解其與人體之關係。此課程主要內容包括(1)食品化學(Food Chemistry)，(2)衣著化學 (Cloth Chemistry)，(3)環境化學(Environmental Chemistry)，(4)核化學(Nuclear Chemistry)，(5)水化學 (Hydrochemistry)，(6)界面化學 (Interface Chemistry)，(7)家庭用化學品 (Household Chemicals)，(8)化粧品學(Cosmetic Chemistry)，(9)電化學 (Electrochemistry)
description.en: This course focuses on chemistry related to People`s Livelihood, including: Food Chemistry, Cloth Chemistry, Environmental Chemistry, Nuclear Chemistry, Hydrochemistry, Interface Chemistry, Household Chemicals, Cosmetic Chemistry, and Electrochemistry. Topics concerning about the manufacturing processes, application principles and recent developments of People`s Livelihood chemicals are also discussed in this course.

name.zh: 軟性電子材料與元件應用
name.en: Soft Electronic Materials and Device applications

description.zh: 本課程目的在於建立學生有關於軟性半導體與元件應用之相關技術與知識，並在學期中讓學生實際動手製備與量測有機半導體元件，以對於有機半導體應用有更深入的認識。課程主題主要(1)有機半導體物理介紹；(2) 有機半導體元件製程與封裝技術；(3)有機發光二極體(OLED)元件應用；(4) 有機場效應電晶體應用；(5)有機太陽能電池；(6)有機記憶體元件應用；(7)有機感測器應用；(8) 奈米碳材元件。
description.en: The goal of this class is to build basic knowledge about organic semiconductors and device applications. Students will also learn how to fabricate organic electronics and have further understanding. The main topics of this class include (1) physics of organic semiconductors; (2) device fabrications and processes; (3) organic light-emitting diodes; (4) organic field-effect transistors; (5) organic solar cells; (6) organic memory; (7) organic sensors; (8) carbon nanomaterial devices.

description.zh: 將熱力學定律應用於計算凝結相之化學位能與其平衡，逸壓和活性因素，溶液熱力學，多元金屬溶液，相圖和相變化，運用電腦模擬相反應和相圖，及研擬冶金數學模式。
description.en:
It applies the theory of thermaldynamics to calculate chemical potential energy and
its equilibrium of condensed phase, released pressure and activated factors, solution
thermaldynamics, complex metal solution , phase diagram and phase change,
computer-aided phase reaction and phase diagram simulation, and planning a
mathmatics model of metallurgy.

name.zh: 數位超大型積體電路設計與佈局

description.zh: CMOS電路簡介、金氧半電晶體理論、金氧半製程技術、電路特性分析、電路功能評估、CMOS電路與邏輯設計、CMOS設計方法、CMOS測試、CMOS次系統設計及CMOS案例討論等。
description.en: Introduction to CMOS Circuit, MOS Transistor Theory, CMOS Technology, Circuit Characterization, Performance Estimation, CMOS circuit and Logic Design, CMOS Design Methods, CMOS Testing, CMOS Subsystem Design,  and CMOS Case Studies.   （已有）

notes: 四電二甲乙丙合開,預選限60人

name.en: English practice and training for engineers

description.zh:
本課程旨在有效提升學生運用英文於工程實務之技巧與能力。主要包括： 一、撰寫個人英文履歷及簡歷。 
     二、閱讀通俗科技文章的能力(含心得報告)。 
     三、使用英文進行簡報的技巧與能力。 
     四、撰寫英文簡報資料的技巧與能力。 
     五、撰寫工作報告的技巧與能力。
本課程授課包括約三分之一的時間在語言教室練習職場英語。
description.en:
This course aims to effectively promote students' capabilities of using English for engineering issues, particularly focused on the following: 1.To write his/her curriculum vitae and resume. 2.To read scientific/technical magazines and handbooks. 3.To present his/her work by English. 4.To write and edit presentation material(s) by English. 5.To construct and write a concise report by English.
The coursed is also devised to include about one third of total teaching hours to practice English, particularly used in office or work, in the language laboratory.

notes: 四電二甲乙合開,預選限50人

description.zh: 簡介，感測器，基本驅動器，順序及計時控制，PLC，伺服驅動器及放大器，基本伺服控制系統。
description.en:
Course Title:Mechatronics Practice
Description:To familiarize students with the usage of mechatronic
techniques and corresponding parts/components

notes: 四電三甲乙丙合開,預選限80人

description.zh:
1.空間描述與數學轉換
2.機械手臂運動學
3.機械手臂反向運動學
4.賈氏矩陣
5.軌跡規劃
6.機械手臂之線性控制
7.機器人視覺
8.機器人避障
9.工業自動化應用
10.實驗項目：機械手臂及機器人操控、結合視覺感測之機械手臂自動化系統、機器人導航與控制
description.en:
1.Spatial description transformation 
2.Manipulation kinematics 
3.Inverse manipulation kinematics 
4.Jacobians 
5.Trajectory generation
6.Linear control of manipulator 
7.Machine vision 
8.Robotic obstacle avoidance 
9.Industrial automation applications 
10.Laboratory work: control of manipulators and mobile robots, automatic manipulation with vision sensors, navigation and control of mobile robots

notes: 四電四甲乙丙合開,預選限21人

name.en: Writing and presentation in the Technical Field

description.zh:
1. 工程寫作的基本技巧
 工程寫作結構、段落、圖表的製作
 國際單位與標點符號
2. 升學與求職之寫作
 簡歷表、自傳與讀書計畫、推薦信
 碩士推甄注意事項
3. 論文與職場之寫作
 論文寫作項目與格式、參考文獻
 備忘錄、會議記錄、產品說明書之寫法
4. 口語表達之藝術
 簡報、投影片製作
 簡報面談注意事項
5. 科技人的人文寫作
description.en:
1. Basic Writing Techniques
 Structures, paragraph, tables and graphics in the technical writing
 Engineering units and punctuations
2. Writing for Application of Schools or Finding Jobs
 Writing of resume, autobiography, letter of recommendation and study plan
 Tips on application to graduate schools
3. Thesis and Work Writing
 Items and format of a thesis
 Writing of references, memo and minutes of meeting
4. Oral Presentation
 Making of films by PowerPoint
 Tips on interviewing skills
5. Literature Writing by Technical Person

notes: 四電四甲乙丙合開,預選限30人

description.zh: 本課程以建築專業回應社會需求為依歸。針對台灣原住民部落之返鄉青年之居住與生產模式提出各項議題討論。藉由社區總體營造與民眾參與等方式，以一學期的進程發展新的部落建築形式與配置計畫，並在永續發展與保育並重的前提下，提出實質開發與營造施工的前期規劃。
description.en: his course introduces the theories, principles, and methods of designing and construction for local social issues in Taiwan. In this year, Focuses on the Settlements of aboriginal people, through cases studies and design practice, the courses seeks to expand the students understanding to the major components of site planning. The topics also focus on six premises:1.theories in relation to site planning;2.design sequences of site planning;3.investigations and analyses of the sites;4.planning and designing methods and their evaluations;5.environmental impact assessment and countermeasures.

notes: 建築三、四與日職建都所合開,專業融入服務學習

description.zh: 本課主要以實例演練、訓練學生對施工圖樣、施工規範及施工實務之瞭解，並熟練數量計算及單價分析之方法及要點。主要授課內容含蓋：1.講授各項工程施工規範之標準、2.以實例訓練各項工程數量計算及單價分析：a.假設工程 b.安全措施工程 c.土方工程 d.混凝土工程 e.模板工程 f.鋼筋工程 g.磚牆工程 h.粉刷及裝修工程 i.雜項工程。
description.en:
The main purpose of this course is training students to comprehend the working drawings, the performance standards and the affairs of works by drilling actual example. This course makes students to be familiar with not only calculating the quantity but also the essentials and the methods in analyzing the unite price. The lesson's contents include: 
A.	To teach the standards of every performance standard. 
B.	To train calculating and analyzing the unite price of every work.
1.	Temporary work 
2.	Safety measure work 
3.	Earthwork
4.	Concrete work
5.	Mold work
6.	Reinforcement work
7.	Partition work
8.	Plaster, decoration and finish work
9.	Miscellaneous work

description.zh: 介紹電子、半導體、績體電路及數位技術的基本原理、及其應用。期使工業設計學生能具備21世紀微電子e世代產品新科技之基本知識。
description.en: A general introduce to the principle of Electronic technology, Semi-conductor, Integrated circuits, Digital technology, and their industrial applications. In order to equip design students with the basic knowledge of Micro-electronic with in the new Era.

description.zh: 本課程介紹電路基本元件與電路之分析方法，內容包含： 1.基本電路元件：電壓源、電流源、電阻器、電容器、電感器 2.柯希荷夫電壓與電流定律，簡單電阻電路，節點分析與網目分析 3.電路學定理：重疊定理、戴維寧與諾頓定理 4.一階電路 5.二階電路 6.弦波穩態分析 7.頻率響應 8.雙埠電路
description.en: The course introduces the basic circuit elements and the methods for analyzing circuits. The topics include: 1.Basic circuit elements: voltage sources, current sources, resistors, capacitors, inductors 2.Kirchhoff voltage and current laws, simple resistive circuits, node analysis and mesh analysis 3.Circuits theorems: superposition principle, Thevenin and Norton theorems 4.First-order circuits 5.Second-order circuits 6.Sinusoidal steady-state analysis 7.Frequency responses 8.Two-port networks

notes: 資工二與四電資二合開

name.zh: 社群媒體與對話機器人系統設計
name.en: Social Media and Chatbot System Design

description.zh: 本課程透過原理解說與系統實作，使學生掌握社群媒體API介接技術，並能運用軟體工程方法，設計對話機器人(Conversational Bot)系統，應用於客服、零售、金融與製造等領域。課程內容包括下列模組：Line及WeChat社群訊息接口，對話訊息格式，Google Dialogflow及IBM Watson Assistant 對話流程開發平台，API流量與安全管理平台，GCP(Google Cloud Platform)及AWS(Amazon Web Service)雲端系統開發框架。藉由程式實作及期末專題設計，引導學生掌握人工智慧語意分析技術，整合後台知識庫與大數據，進而設計對話機器人應用系統。
description.en: This course provides students with the knowledge and skills to design intelligent conversational bot application systems using Line Messaging API and WeChat Open Platform.  Course spans a variety of technologies such as natural language understanding tools, Google Dialogflow, IBM Watson Assistant, API management framework, GCP (Google Cloud Platform) and AWS (Amazon Web Service) cloud platform services to design and manage conversation flows for intelligent customer service systems.  Programming exercises and term projects are included to help students understand the basic ideas and practical tools in intelligent conversational bot system design.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in. description.zh: 金屬工藝應用是一門以實作應用為主，概念講述為輔的金工課程，透過實際工藝技術進行教學，提供學生具基礎金工器物的製作能力，進而設計應用於生活物件，引導學生具系統性設計及製作能力，轉化概念成實技製作的專業，希望學生藉完成金屬工藝作品，將生活經驗中的價值與意涵融入，創造出屬於個人風格之設計。
description.en: The course ?Metalwork and Design? focuses mainly on practical application, while employing concepts thereof supplementary. The class is taught through demonstration and actual execution of arts and crafts techniques, thus providing students with the basic skills for utensil manufacturing. Followed by designing applicable day-to-day objects, the ultimate goal is to equip students with systematic designing and manufacturing aptitude, hence transmuting concepts into solid expertise. What we desire to achieve is that the students' completed work of art will be a blend of personal significance and practical value derived from everyday experiences.

notes: 共同科9樓工藝教室上課；限16人

description.zh:
先修課程:4402012或負責教授同意
介紹各種不同方法分析（如能量法及 Castigliano 定理），破壞理論，材料選用，可靠度概念，軸及軸承，離合器及煞車器，傳動元件（如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪），軸聯接器，飛輪，彈簧等。
description.en: Introduction to Analysis Methods (Energy method & Castigliano theorem), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to Reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains, Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, Springs.

name.en: Special Topics on Clean Power System

description.zh: 介紹各種潔淨且高效率的先進車輛動力系統的型式及其工作原理並分析技巧。項目包含車輛能源所面臨的一些問題及可能的解決方案、優良動力源的特性、電動系統、複合電動系統、複合氣動系統、氫燃料電池動力系統、金屬燃料電池動力系統、各種替代性燃料的特性及優缺點、太陽光電輔助動力系統等。
description.en: This course introduces various kinds of clean and high-efficiency vehicular power systems, their operation principles, and analytical skills. Topics include: problems and possible solutions the vehicular power system faces, characteristics of a good vehicular power system, electric power system, hybrid electric power system, hybrid pneumatic power system, fuel cell power system, metallic fuel-cell power system, substitutive fuels, and solar-energy auxiliary power system.

notes: 車輛四和日、職車輛所合開

description.zh:
本課程為「電磁波」課程之延伸，以電磁波輻射特性之探討為主,可作為研究所「電波傳播」、「無線通訊系統」與「智慧型天線」等課程基礎。

預修科目: 電磁波、電波工程導論

中文概述
1.行動通訊系統中之天線基本觀念
2.天線重要基本參數
3.電磁波輻射特性
4.線型天線
5.微帶天線
6.天線陣列設計
7.天線量測
description.en:
1.General view of Antenna in Mobile System
2.Fundamental Parameters of Antenna
3.Radiation Characteristics of Electromagnetic Wave
4.Linear Wire Antenna
5.Microstrip Antenna
6.Antenna Array Design
7.Antenna Measurement

description.zh: 操作化學相關的實驗
description.en: It covers the fundamental experiments in chemistry.

name.zh: 基頻通訊積體電路設計實驗
name.en: Baseband Communication Integrated Circuits Design Laboratory

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計基頻通訊積體電路,進而能培養學生具有設計基頻通訊積體電路的能力,課程內容包念： 1. 數位傳輸 2. 頻道模式 3. 接收器設計 4. 進階系統設計
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of baseband communication integrated circuits. Therefore, the student has the design capability of baseband communication integrated circuits. The contents of this course: 1. Digital transmission 2.Channel model 3.Receiver design 4.Advanced systems design

description.zh: (A) 部分：1.基本CMOS邏輯閘設計，2.CMOS基本邏輯閘時序模擬，3.CMOS基本邏輯閘佈局，4.數位電路功能分析與模擬，5.階層式的電路組成，6.中小型電路設計，7.VHDL系統，(B) 部分：1.認識Cadence系統， 2.圖形編輯設備的操作練習，3.零件庫介紹，4.設計電路之輸入編輯，5.電路模擬實習，6.數位電路的晶片設計，7.晶片製造專題。
description.en:
(A)
1.Basic CMOS logic design
2.CMOS logic gate simulation 
3.CMOS logic gate placement
4.Analysis and simulation of digital circuit 
5.Hierachy circuit
6.VHDL system
(B)
1.Introduction to c cadence system
2.Graphic editor practice
3.module
4.Input editor 
5.Circuit simulation practice
6.Special projects

description.zh: 本課程介紹西洋藝術之審美與欣賞。包含從古希臘時期到俄羅斯前衛主義之西方藝術作品賞析。以編年和主題式的編排，並特別強調藝術風格的源流與內容分析。使學生理解在不同的社會、文化、宗教和歷史背景之下，各個時期的藝術家，創作出的作品成就。
description.en: This course introduces the aesthetic and appreciation of Western art, which includes works in the ancient Greek period to the Russian avant-garde. To choreographers and thematic choreography, it would particular emphasis on techniques and content analysis, so that students could understand the different social, cultural, religious and historical background, and how the artists of all periods had created their works.

notes: 博雅選修必選-美學向度

description.zh:
國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。
本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en:
"Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.

This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series.

description.zh: 本課程主在讓學生瞭解服務業的重要性和特性.如何作好服務並使顧客滿意。 內容:服務業概論、服務傳送系統、服務業地點選擇、服務品質、生產力和品質改善、預測、服務業的經營策略、個案討論、論文討論。
description.en: Service management is to discuss How to manage service and satisfy customers. The content of the course: Service concept 、The service delivery system 、Service facility and layout、Productivity and quality improvement、Forecasting、Service quality、Service strategy、Customer satisfaction、Case study、Paper discuss.

description.zh:
介紹審計準則與查核報告、職業道德、專業責任的保持：查核人員的監管和法律責任、審計證據、審計業務承接、內部控制、資訊科技環境下的審計、審計抽樣的應、查核工作底稿、收入循環、採購支出及付款循環等。
本課程參考最新國際準則公報並依照現行教學及考試方向調整原有架構之外，更針對鑑識審計、公司治理、審計業務承接、查帳和客戶之間的關係、風險評估以及資訊科技環境下的審計等做了更多的著墨，而近更動之審計公報也於本版一併進行更新，以求更符合趨勢。
description.en:
Introduction auditing standards and audit report, maintaining professional ethics, professional responsibility: the regulatory and legal responsibility to check personnel, audit evidence, audit business undertaking, internal control, information technology audit environment, audit sampling should be to check the working papers, income circulation, procurement spending and payment cycle and so on.
The course reference to the latest international standards and adjust the original architecture communique teaching and examination in accordance with current direction, it is more for the forensic audit, corporate governance, auditing business undertaking, under the audit and the relationship between the customer, risk assessment and information technology environment audit done more inked, and audit bulletin of recent changes in this edition also be updated in order to be more consistent with the trend.

description.zh: 掌握形式從屬機能旨意，熟悉施作技術限制與創意可行性，學習從設計到實作的落實，透過各種機械設備操作、加工技術學習，實際接觸及操作真實材料，了解材料種類、性質、加工過程、組裝知識、技術與美學等，以呈現設計作品之原型與成品。
description.en: Based on “Form follows Function”, student will learn interacts and limitations among technology feasibility and creative application, in order to master sequential implementations form design ideas to real works. Students are required to operate various mechanical equipment and processing technologies, thus to realize the types and nature of the materials, processing procedure, as well as the assembly of knowledge, technologies and aesthetics to format intended design prototypes and establishments.

description.zh: 應用設計手繪工具與技法於各種設計作品圖面呈現，培養學生對空間、形體、材質、介面、裝置、比例等簡潔繪畫技巧與圖示性設計圖表達能力。
description.en: Students will learn to sketch by hand in various tools and technologies on design drawings. The simple painting tips as, spatial perceptive, presentation of form and materials, interfaces media types and installations, and proportion as well as abilities of the infographic design presentation will be taught in this class.

description.zh:
講授工程圖之基本原理及規則，並佐以必要之工程設計知識與AutoCAD
繪圖技巧,培養學生具備熟練與有效率地將設計構想以工程圖方式正確
表達的能力。
description.en: An introductory course providing the student with fundamental information, understanding and skills mainly in orthographic projection. Theories and principles of engineering drawing will be specifically introduced and concurrent with the practice of drafting for industrial design.

description.zh: 讓學生習得3D 材質編修電腦軟體之技能，俾能將工業設計產品進行材質模擬與色彩計劃。
description.en: The study of materials edit computer software which could apply materials simulation and color plan on industrial design products.

description.zh: 以國內外設計競賽為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國內外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: This course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions, guide and help students ' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

description.zh: 應用快速手繪觀念結合數位技術等工具軟體，使設計作品之發表及簡報方式能達到視覺上更豐富而生動的表達效果。
description.en: Teaching student to use digital software to simulate design proposal for a perfect presentation.

notes: 工設二三合開；人數上限40人

description.zh: 速寫是最古老、最容易、最快速的溝通方式之一，也是充滿希望的設計師及藝術家必備的絕技。藉由大量的植物寫生，提昇觀察能力並把線條練活，進而建立起掌控「形」的基本信心。接下來的靜物寫生著重整體的構圖關係，利用黑白灰的構圖原理，著眼在傳其「神」而不是傳其「形」。將前階段的單線練習，改作分塊、分面的線群練習。再接下來是人物肖像寫生練習。到此，線條的特質、比例的嚴謹皆要掌控，肖像對象的性別、年齡、特徵以及由內在而外顯的神韻，是畫者所要表達的。
description.en:
Sketching is one of the oldest, easiest and quickest methods of communication 
and also one of the most important skills a hopeful designer and artist must master. 
The course begins with a lot of plants sketching that helps to enhance your observation and build up your confidence in mastering forms and shapes in order to make your sketches vivid. Next still life sketching focuses on the composition. You are encouraged to utilize the composition principle of black, white and gray, and emphasize more on the vividness than the form until you get rid of the habit of passive copying of the objects. Then you move from the previous linear sketching practice into facet sketching and then block sketching. At the end of the semester, you will practice human portrait sketching. Until now you should be able to handle not only the characteristics of the line and proportion, but also the gender, age, charm and expression of the model.

notes: 工設二三四合開；人數上限60人

description.zh: 室內設計在3D場景的應用，包括模型的建立，燈光材質的設定以及整體設計之搭配。
description.en: The Application of interior design in 3D scene, including the setting-up of model, establishment of the light material and matching of integrated design.

notes: 家室組；新聘；人數上限40人

description.zh: 21世紀的工業設計師已不能再靜待市場研究及產品企劃人員提供產品設計規範，而應以使用者代言人、及企業產品開發整合者身分，主動參與產品策略與企劃，並以視覺化技術協助相關人員作橫向溝通。因此，「產品創新設計策略與企劃」課程主要目標在教導學生以「前瞻性的視野」，透過創新設計的步驟與方法，策劃出符合企業技術及經營體質，並且能滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品。本課程將以理論、方法、案例研討及個案研究方式進行。
description.en: The function of industrial design in the 21st century, will no longer waiting for the product definition from the marketing and product planning, It will become a integrator and visualizer during the product innovation strategic phase, and concerning to the user's needs. Product Innovation Strategy will guide the enterprise looking beyond their current operation to match their technologies and the distinct competencies with emerging the user and the market needs. The contents of this topic will include theory, methodology, and practical case study.

notes: 工設三四與日職碩合開；一教1F教室；人數上限24人

description.zh:
本次更利用業界常用之光學模擬軟體RSoft以及COMSOL進行光學元件與系統設計，主要探討近代光學之應用，如光通訊，光敏材料和奈米光學結構等主題進行設計與討論。
課程最後使用專題來檢驗學生學習成果，可探討題目有一維光子晶體：薄膜干涉、抗反射膜設計，二維/三維光子晶體，微結構之穿透反射頻譜、能隙分布（BandGap）計算，Meta-materials：微結構天線、光學抗反射結構（隱形斗篷），基礎波動光學：雙狹縫干涉、單狹縫繞射、散射（Rayleigh Scattering、Mie Scattering）等。
description.en:
The used tool for this class is RSoft and COMSOL, common-used optical simulation software in industries. 
Students should present their work through final project presentations to examine their learning outcomes. The topics for final project include one-dimensional photonic crystals: thin film interference, anti-reflection film design, 2D/3D photonic crystals, transmission spectrum of microstructure, Bandgap calculation , Meta-materials: Micro-structured antennas, optical anti-refl

notes: 光電三、四、所和電資外生合開，Comsol, Rsoft

description.zh: 建立設計專業用日文基礎；日文發音、拼音、基本句型、詞類文法及設計專業日文導讀，用以唸讀及理解設計專業相關日文。
description.en: Introducing the alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of Japanese to building the capability of reading and understanding the design based Japanese.

description.zh: 以國外設計競賽為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國內外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: This course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions, guide and help students' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

description.zh: 1.基本分析工具介紹(6) 2.基本光學系統--近軸光學(6) 3.光學系統元件介紹(6) 4.像差理論(6) 5.像質評估(6) 6.光學系統設計(6) 7.光學套裝軟體使用(6) 8.光電設計專題(9)
description.en: 1.The tools 2.The basic optical systems 3.Basic optical devices 4.Seidel aberrations 5.Image evaluation 6.The design of optical systems 7.The use of Zemax 8.Project on optical design

notes: 系所合開,擬抵研究所不列大學畢業學分請選研究所課號

description.zh: 本課程介紹西洋藝術之審美與欣賞。包含從古希臘時期到俄羅斯前衛主義之西方藝術作品賞析。以編年和主題式的編排，並特別強調藝術風格的源流與內容分析。使學生理解在不同的社會、文化、宗教和歷史背景之下，各個時期的藝術家，創作出的作品成就。
description.en: This course introduces the aesthetic and appreciation of Western art, which includes works in the ancient Greek period to the Russian avant-garde. To choreographers and thematic choreography, it would particular emphasis on techniques and content analysis, so that students could understand the different social, cultural, religious and historical background, and how the artists of all periods had created their works.

notes: 博雅選修必選-美學向度

description.zh: 為增進本校工程相關科系學生之基礎數學能力，本課程希望在18小時中，能使學生對基礎數學有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習微積分之數學基礎。課程內容包括：1. 數與式、2. 不等式、3. 直角坐標系、4. 直線、5. 圓錐曲線、6. 指數與對數、7. 三角函數、8. 向量。
description.en: With the purpose for improving the comprehension in fundamental mathematics for students who major in Engineering, and for building up solid background of Calculus for students' future training, it is planned to have this course. This 18 hours course aims at developing comprehension of basic mathematics、activating capabilities of Logic、strengthening the abilities of computing with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1. Numbers、Functions and Equations, 2. Inequalities, 3. Rectangular Coordinates, 4. Lines, 5. Quadratic Equations, 6. Exponents and Logarithms, 7. Trigonometric Functions , 8. Vectors.

notes: A班,每週一、二18:30~21:10(開學第二週開始上課)

description.zh: 為增進本校工程相關科系學生之基礎數學能力，本課程希望在18小時中，能使學生對基礎數學有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習微積分之數學基礎。課程內容包括：1. 數與式、2. 不等式、3. 直角坐標系、4. 直線、5. 圓錐曲線、6. 指數與對數、7. 三角函數、8. 向量。
description.en: With the purpose for improving the comprehension in fundamental mathematics for students who major in Engineering, and for building up solid background of Calculus for students' future training, it is planned to have this course. This 18 hours course aims at developing comprehension of basic mathematics、activating capabilities of Logic、strengthening the abilities of computing with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1. Numbers、Functions and Equations, 2. Inequalities, 3. Rectangular Coordinates, 4. Lines, 5. Quadratic Equations, 6. Exponents and Logarithms, 7. Trigonometric Functions , 8. Vectors.

notes: B班,每週三、四18:30~21:10(開學第二週開始上課)

description.zh: 為增進本校工程相關科系學生之基礎數學能力，本課程希望在18小時中，能使學生對基礎數學有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習微積分之數學基礎。課程內容包括：1. 數與式、2. 不等式、3. 直角坐標系、4. 直線、5. 圓錐曲線、6. 指數與對數、7. 三角函數、8. 向量。

This 18 hours course aims at developing comprehension of basic mathematics、activating capabilities of Logic、strengthening the abilities of computing with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1. Numbers、Functions and Equations, 2. Inequalities, 3. Rectangular Coordinates, 4. Lines, 5. Quadratic Equations, 6. Exponents and Logarithms, 7. Trigonometric Functions , 8. Vectors.

notes: C班每週一、四18:30~21:10(開學第二週開始上課)
